title: Business Development Executive – UK Property Finance (Remote Work)
description:
Business Development Executive – UK Property Finance (Remote, Night Shift PH)



Company: Envelop Finance

Location: Remote – Philippines

Job Type: Full-Time (Long-Term)

Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 08:00 – 17:30 UK Time

(Night / early morning shift in the Philippines)



Salary: USD $900 – $1,200 per month + commission + discretionary bonuses

________________________________________



IMPORTANT – PLEASE READ



This role requires working UK business hours.

Please apply only if you are comfortable working a night shift in the Philippines on a long-term basis.

________________________________________



About the Company



Envelop Finance is a UK-based property finance company working with professionals across the UK property industry. We partner with brokers, estate agents, commercial property agents, accountants, solicitors, and other property-related professionals to provide tailored property finance solutions for their clients.

________________________________________



About the Role



We are hiring a Business Development Executive to support outbound outreach and partnership development. This role involves speaking with UK-based property professionals to introduce Envelop Finance, build relationships, qualify interest, and book appointments or pass qualified leads to our UK-based team.

This is not a call-centre role. Conversations are professional, consultative, and relationship-focused.

________________________________________



Key Responsibilities

• Outbound calling and
 outreach to UK-based property professionals

• Research UK property professionals and firms prior to outreach to ensure relevant, personalised conversations

• Tailor outreach based on firm type, client profile, and likely finance needs

• Introduce Envelop Finance and our property finance services

• Build professional relationships and identify referral opportunities

• Use a combination of outbound calls,
s, and LinkedIn outreach to build and nurture relationships

• Book well-qualified, relevant appointments that meet agreed criteria, rather than volume-based bookings

• Maintain accurate CRM records and call notes

• Meet daily, weekly, and monthly activity and quality targets

________________________________________



Required Skills & Experience

• Excellent spoken and written English (neutral or clear accent preferred)

• Experience in B2B sales, business development, lead generation, or outbound calling

• Confident speaking with senior professionals

• Comfortable working UK night shift hours

• Strong organisation and time-management skills

• Reliable internet connection, headset, and quiet home office

________________________________________



Nice to Have (Not Required)

• Experience in property, real estate, finance, or mortgage-related roles

• Experience using CRM systems (HubSpot, Salesforce, Zoho, etc.)

• Experience working with UK, US, or Australian clients

________________________________________



Compensation & Benefits

• Base Salary: USD $900 – $1,200 per month (depending on experience)

• Commission: Paid per qualified appointment or partnership generated

• Discretionary Bonuses: Based on performance, quality, and reliability

• Paid training and ongoing support

• Long-term, stable remote position with growth opportunities

________________________________________



How to Apply (IMPORTANT)



To be considered, please include the following in your application:

1. A short summary of your B2B calling or sales experience

2. Confirmation that you can work UK hours (08:00 – 17:30 UK time)

3. Your expected monthly salary in USD

4. The word “ENVELOP” in the first line of your application

5. Your CV



APPLICATIONS THAT DO NOT FOLLOW THESE STEPS MAY NOT BE REVIEWED.

title: Finance & Operations Manager  (QBO Expert + Controller-Level + Workflow Automation)
description:
Role Summary

We’re a small, fast-moving business looking for a highly skilled finance leader who can clean and maintain our QuickBooks Online (QBO), provide financial leadership and decision support, and run day-to-day operations by improving and managing end-to-end workflows.

This role is hands-on: you will execute, improve processes, and hold a weekly cadence to keep finance and operations running smoothly.



NOTE: this role is Finance (Controller-level) + Operations daily ownership + advisory, not basic bookkeeping.





Key Responsibilities



A) Finance Ownership (QBO Expert)

-Clean up and maintain QuickBooks Online (QBO): chart of accounts, rules, recurring items, and reporting structure

-Own invoicing/billing standards, categorization, and documentation

-Perform weekly bank/credit card reconciliations and monthly close reconciliations

-Manage A/R and A/P: accurate aging, payment application, vendor balances, scheduling

-Produce monthly financials: P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow, plus commentary



Build and maintain:

cash forecast

Budget vs actual tracking

Margin and cost-driver analysis (COGS, shipping/logistics, overhead







B) Operations Daily Management

-Own daily execution across the workflow (you will manage the system + follow-ups)

-Maintain an operations tracker for orders, invoices, payments, shipments, and exceptions

-Drive SOP compliance across the team (checklists, standards, deadlines)

-Identify bottlenecks and fix them (time-to-invoice, payment delays, shipping issues)



C) Workflow Automation & Process Improvement

-Build/maintain automations using Zapier / Make / n8n (or manage a contractor)

-Automate repetitive tasks with controls:

-approvals, exception queues, audit logs

-Improve reporting pipelines (QBO exports ? Sheets dashboards)



Required Qualifications (Non-Negotiable)

5+ years accounting/finance experience, SMB preferred

Proven QBO cleanup experience (not just bookkeeping)

Strong reconciliation skills (including deposits/undeposited funds)

Ability to explain numbers and advise leadership (cash, margin, budgeting)

Operations/process mindset: SOPs, workflow management, accountability cadence

Strong Sheets/Excel: pivots, lookups, clean dashboards



Work Setup

Full-time, remote (PH-based)

Must overlap with business hours for daily ops coordination

Reports to: Owner/CEO & Director



PERKS!!!

-PAID TIME OFF

-13th MONTH PAY

-BONUS STRUCTURE

title: Lead Generation Specialist (AI-Savvy, A+ Player)
description:
Find the right businesses, initiate genuine conversations, and schedule qualified meetings. You’ll use AI (ChatGPT/Claude/others), data tools (Apollo/Clay/others), and simple automations to move faster and smarter.





What You’ll Do

1. Find leads: Build clean lists of ideal companies and decision-makers (LinkedIn + databases).

2. Use AI to research & personalize: Summarize companies, spot buying signals, and draft tailored messages at scale.

3. Run outreach:

4. Keep data clean: Update CRM/Sheets, remove duplicates, track replies and reasons.

5. Share what works: Save templates, prompts, and steps so anyone can repeat your wins.

Must-Haves (A+)

• 3–4+ years in B2B lead gen/SDR with proof of results (screenshots or KPI summaries).

• Strong writing in English (short, clear, on-point).

• Hands-on with Apollo or Clay or other and one mail tool (Instantly/Lemlist/Smartlead/etc).

• Comfortable with Google Sheets (filters, lookups) and basic deliverability (warmup, custom domains).

• You already use AI to speed up research and outreach.



Nice to Have

• Light data cleaning (CSV rules/regex).

• HubSpot/Pipedrive CRM experience.

s you wrote (before/after personalization)

A 25-contact sample list for our ICP (company, name, title,

Put “I am a rockstar Leadgen”

title: Growth Marketing Manager
description:
About the Role

Own full-funnel growth to drive qualified demos and installs for our U.S.-based turnkey beverage system. You’ll plan, launch, and optimize multi-channel campaigns across paid and organic, manage CAC, and partner with Sales to convert pipeline. We run a flat org, so you’ll lead and execute projects end-to-end. AI tools can help you move faster—but core marketing skills come first.



Expected Outcomes

1. Deliver a steady monthly flow of qualified (B2B,  B2C, etc) demos from target tiers.

2. Maintain a channel mix that meets CAC, payback, and LTV:CAC targets.

3. Ship content and landing pages quickly with clear positioning.

4. Provide sales enablement that shortens time-to-close.

5. Publish trustworthy weekly reporting from Leads ? Opportunities ? Installs.



Key Responsibilities

• Strategy & Planning: Build quarterly plans, budgets, and testing roadmaps aligned to OKRs.

• Demand Gen: Manage Google/Meta/LinkedIn, retargeting, and basic SEO; craft offers and funnels (ads ? LP ? demo).

• Content & Landing Pages: Write/edit copy for LPs,
s, and case studies; coordinate light design in Canva/Figma.

• Lifecycle/CRM: Own HubSpot/Zoho hygiene, lead routing, SLAs (Service Level Agreement), and nurture sequences.

• Analytics: Maintain GA4 + dashboard; run experiments; report insights & next actions weekly.

• Collab: Partner with Sales/BD for messaging, objection handling, and asset needs; work with Ops for testimonials and install proof.







Background & Qualifications



Must-Have

• Experience: 4–7+ years in B2B growth/demand gen (owning pipeline targets, not just impressions).

• Channels: Hands-on with Google Ads, Meta, LinkedIn; basic SEO (keyword plan, on-page, briefs).

• Funnel Build: Can design and ship ads ? landing page ? demo funnels and
 nurtures.

• Tools: a CRM/marketing platform, one LP builder,  AI, etc

• Analytics: Comfortable with CAC, LTV:CAC, payback period, attribution basics; can build weekly dashboards.

• Copy & Offers: Writes clear positioning and testable offers for SMB decision makers (owners/operators).

• Collaboration: Works cross-functionally with Sales/BD and Ops

• Work Setup: Remote discipline, strong project management, and 3+ hours overlap with U.S. business hours.

• Communication: Solid English (written & spoken); concise reporting of insights and next actions.



Nice to Have (Preferred)

• Industry: Food & beverage, franchise/partner marketing, or SMB services.

• Enablement: Case studies, objection handlers, ROI calculators; webinar playbooks.

• Data: Looker/Data Studio, basic spreadsheets/queries; comfort pulling raw insights.

• Design Light: Canva/Figma for fast landing pages and one-pagers.



AI Experience (Plus, Not Required)





Education / Credentials

• Bachelor’s in Marketing/Business/Communications or equivalent track record of shipping growth results.

• Certifications 





Setup & Comp

• Location: Remote (Philippines) 

•  Reports to: CEO

• Comp: Base within $1,800–$2,300/mo (USD) + KPI-tied bonus

• WFH perks 

• (Paid Time Off, Holidays)

• 13th month pay 

• Flexible time with U.S. overlap



Portfolio Requirements:

• 2–3 short “win stories” (goal ? tactic ? result, with numbers).

• 1–2 live or archived LPs you built/owned + ad examples.

• A redacted dashboard snapshot showing CAC/ROAS/LTV:CAC and how you acted on it.



Note that this is a key position. Expect a longer hiring process.

title: Fractional Paid Media Partner – DTC Growth
description:
We are seeking a fractional paid media partner to help scale a women’s health DTC brand currently generating approximately $55K per month in revenue.



This is not a campaign management role.



We are looking for a performance-driven partner who understands how to scale subscription-based DTC brands from $50K per month toward $200K+ per month with disciplined testing, creative leadership, and clear performance accountability.



You will work directly with the CEO and Growth Operator.



What This Role Is Responsible For

• Owning paid acquisition strategy across Meta, TikTok, google and other relevant channels

• Developing and managing a structured creative testing roadmap

• Providing weekly performance breakdowns with actionable insights

• Recommending budget allocation based on performance and blended CAC

• Setting CAC targets aligned with LTV and subscription economics

• Coordinating with internal creative and growth teams

• Documenting paid media SOPs for long-term scalability



This role is not about launching ads and reporting ROAS.

It is about building a repeatable acquisition engine.



What We Are Looking For

• Proven experience scaling DTC brands in the $50K to $200K+ per month range

• Strong understanding of subscription LTV and payback periods

• Creative-first mindset

• Experience running structured testing cycles

• Ability to communicate clearly in weekly reporting

• Comfort operating with data and making decisive recommendations



You must be able to explain not only what happened, but why it happened and what to do next.



What Success Looks Like in 90 Days

• Clear paid acquisition strategy aligned with revenue targets

• Creative testing framework in place

• Consistent weekly reporting cadence

• Defined CAC targets tied to LTV

• Predictable acquisition performance trends



Application Process



Step 1: Why This Role Video

Submit a 3 to 5 minute video answering:

 1. Why are you uniquely qualified to scale a subscription-based DTC brand at this stage?

 2. What mistakes do brands at $50K per month typically make in paid acquisition?

 3. What would you prioritize first in the first 60 days?



Step 2: Case Exercise

You will be provided with high-level metrics under NDA including:

• Current revenue

• AOV

• Subscription percentage

• Current ad spend

• Current blended CAC

• Top-performing products



Based on this information, provide:

• A 60-day paid acquisition roadmap

• CAC targets tied to LTV assumptions

• Budget allocation recommendation

• Creative testing plan

• Risks and tradeoffs



We are evaluating clarity, logic, and prioritization — not presentation design.

title: Growth & Revenue Operator
description:
We are hiring a Growth & Revenue Operator to partner directly with the CEO in scaling a women’s health DTC CGP brand currently generating approximately $55K per month in revenue.



This is not a VA role.

This is a strategic execution role.



You will help bring structured growth thinking, disciplined execution, and revenue accountability to the business.



You are not expected to replace the CEO’s vision.

You are expected to help turn it into measurable results.



What You Will Own

• Build and maintain weekly revenue dashboards

• Track CAC, AOV, LTV, retention, and subscription metrics

• Identify bottlenecks and propose focused growth initiatives

• Structure and manage 90-day growth sprints

• Coordinate creative testing with paid media and content

• Optimize subscription and affiliate performance

• Build and document SOPs for all growth workflows



What We’re Looking For

• Strong understanding of DTC growth fundamentals

• Comfortable with Shopify analytics and subscription metrics

• Thinks in tradeoffs and prioritization

• Able to make data-backed recommendations

• Works US hours

• Proactive, organized, and disciplined

• Comfortable pushing back respectfully with logic



Experience with Klaviyo, subscription apps, funnel math, and project management tools is preferred.





What Success Looks Like in the First 90 Days

• A clear revenue dashboard built from scratch

• Weekly KPI reporting rhythm established

• A defined growth sprint in motion

• At least three structured experiments running

• All major growth processes documented





Application Process

Step 1: Video Submission

Record a 2 to 3 minute video answering:

“How would you approach scaling a $55K per month DTC brand to $100K per month within 3 months?”



Focus on prioritization, not volume of ideas.



Step 2: Sample Work

Submit one example of a dashboard or reporting framework you have built.



Step 3: 100-Day Growth Plan Exercise



Selected candidates will be asked to sign an NDA and receive limited brand data including:

• Current revenue

• AOV

•
 list size

• Subscription percentage

• Traffic sources

• Product mix



Based on this information, you will outline a focused 100-day growth plan including:

 1. Top 3 revenue priorities only

 2. Specific initiatives within each priority

 3. Weekly KPIs that would be tracked

 4. What you would stop or deprioritize

 5. Key risks and tradeoffs



This exercise is designed to evaluate strategic thinking, clarity, and prioritization.



We are not looking for 30 ideas.

We are looking for focus and revenue logic.

title: Appointment Setter

This is not a small opportunity.

Local businesses routinely recover significant lost revenue while paying only $250–$500 per month.



Retention is high.



Clients stay.

 campaigns

 templates

???? Who This Is For

• People who want income tied to performance

• Individuals willing to go above and beyond



English proficiency is a must have.



If you need micromanagement, this is not for you.



If you want guaranteed base-only income, this is not for you.



If you want serious upside and are willing to outwork others, this is a strong opportunity.



???? Why This Opportunity Is Different

You are stepping into:

The largest industry in the world — AI.

And the largest subcategory within it — AI-driven business automation.

title: Shopify E-commerce Product SEO Specialist
description:
Job Title: Shopify E-commerce Product SEO Specialist



Location: Remote – Philippines only (Philippine-based applicants)



Job Type: Full-time / Part-time



About Us:

We are a fast-growing e-commerce business focused on Shopify and Amazon stores. We are seeking a detail-oriented, dependable, honest, and trustworthy professional with excellent written and verbal English communication skills. As a Shopify E-commerce Product SEO Specialist, you will manage, optimize, and grow our online stores through product uploads, website design, SEO, automation, and operational support.



Key Responsibilities:

E-commerce Operations (Shopify, Amazon & More): Upload products, variants, SKUs, collections, pricing, and formatting on Shopify and Amazon. Track inventory, monitor orders, perform QA checks, generate sales reports, and analyze product performance. Experience with other e-commerce platforms is a plus, including Etsy, eBay, TikTok Shop, SHEIN, Walmart, Wayfair, Lowe’s, and Home Depot.



Shopify Website Design & Optimization: Design and optimize Shopify website layout, page structures, and navigation. Create Figma-based wireframes and page designs. Optimize homepage, product pages, and collection pages for UI/UX and mobile responsiveness.



Automation & Systems: Build and manage workflow automation using Zapier, 
, and n8n. Use AI tools such as ChatGPT and Gemini for product descriptions, SEO content, reporting, and SOP creation. Create SOPs, optimize processes, and maintain documentation.



Data, Reporting & Analytics: Create sales, inventory, and KPI dashboards using Excel, Google Sheets, Power BI, and Looker Studio. Clean, validate, reconcile, and report data accurately. Perform CRM, marketing, and e-commerce performance analysis.



Executive & Operations Support: Manage
 and calendars for team leads or executives. Coordinate tasks and ensure operational follow-through. Execute responsibilities reliably with a strong ownership mindset.



SEO & Marketing: Perform onsite and offsite SEO optimization for product pages and website content. Conduct keyword research and competitor tracking. Ensure ADA compliance and high-quality image creation for new products. Manage branding, A+ content, product organization, menu setup, and metafield creation.



Requirements:

Proven experience in Shopify and Amazon e-commerce operations. Strong knowledge of SEO best practices for e-commerce. Experience with Shopify website design, Figma, and page optimization. Familiarity with workflow automation using Zapier, 
, and n8n. Proficient in data analysis, dashboards, and reporting tools. Excellent written and verbal English communication skills. Detail-oriented, dependable, honest, and trustworthy. Ability to work independently, meet deadlines, and communicate effectively.



Preferred Skills:

Experience with Go High Level or similar marketing automation platforms. Familiarity with ADA compliance for websites. Experience with other e-commerce platforms, including Etsy, eBay, TikTok Shop, SHEIN, Walmart, Wayfair, Lowe’s, and Home Depot. Strong understanding of branding, A+ content, and product merchandising.



Contract Details:

Starting pay is $3 per hour. Hours will be 25–30 hours per week based on workload. Schedule is 11 PM – 4 AM GMT or 11 PM – 5 AM GMT. Work days are Monday to Friday (USA) / Tuesday to Saturday (Philippine workdays). Location is remote – Philippines only. Requirements include contract, an NDA, Wise payment account, Timeproof time tracker, and daily timesheet. You will work with our Philippines-based design team in a remote capacity.

Please carefully follow the instructions below to ensure your application is eligible. This is considered your first test for the job position, as the role requires strong attention to detail and the ability to follow instructions precisely.



Please
 your application to 



Important Requirement:

We only hire Filipino-based contractors. If you are not based in the Philippines, please do not apply.



Please include the following in your
:

A link to your OnlineJobs.ph profile. Your resume. Your portfolio. The position you are applying for. A brief introduction about yourself and why you are best suited for the job. When you are available to start if hired. Acknowledgment that you have read the full job posting, including salary, work hours, NDA term, and attendance requirements.



Applications that do not follow these instructions will not be considered.

title: Video Editor – Short Form & Paid Creative
description:
We are hiring a skilled Video Editor to help drive content and paid creative for a fast-growing women’s health DTC brand.



This is not just an editing role.



This role exists to turn raw footage into scroll-stopping, conversion-focused content that supports growth across organic and paid channels.



You will work closely with the CEO and Growth Operator.





What You Will Create

• High-performing Reels and TikTok videos

• Paid ad creatives for Meta and TikTok

• YouTube Shorts

• Founder-led talking head edits

• Test variations of the same creative

• Long-form repurposing into short-form assets



You will help build a creative engine, not just edit clips.



What We Expect From You

• Strong understanding of short-form hook structure

• Ability to edit for retention and pacing

• Strong instincts around scroll behavior

• Understanding of direct-response creative principles

• Ability to test multiple angles from one raw video

• Organized file management and content library systems

• Comfortable working with performance feedback



You should be able to explain why an edit performs, not just how it looks.



You Will Also

• Build repeatable editing workflows

• Create branded templates

• Organize content by theme, offer, and campaign

• Document editing SOPs

• Collaborate with paid media to produce testing variations

• Help scale creative output without sacrificing quality





What Success Looks Like in 60–90 Days

• Consistent output of 3–5 short-form pieces per week

• Creative variations built intentionally for testing

• Improved retention metrics on short-form content

• Paid creative structured for performance, not aesthetics

• Organized creative library with clear labeling





Application Process



Step 1: Portfolio Submission

Submit at least 3 short-form examples. Include one that feels direct-response oriented.



Step 2: Why This Role Video

Record a 2–3 minute video explaining:

	1.	What makes short-form content convert?

	2.	How you think about retention and pacing

	3.	How you would approach editing for a founder-led brand





Step 3: Editing Test

We will provide raw footage.

You will:



• Create 1 organic version

• Create 1 paid-ad version

• Provide 2 alternate hooks



We are evaluating creative thinking, not just technical skill.

title: Operations Assistant (Marketing / Advertising Agency)
description:
We are a performance-driven advertising agency specialized in newsletter growth and monetization. We work with fast-scaling brands and focus heavily on data, performance optimization, and operational excellence.



We are hiring a highly organized Operations Assistant to work directly alongside the Head of Operations in supporting company-wide execution.



Role Overview

You will act as a right hand to the Head of Operations, helping structure, track, and optimize. You will be involved in reporting, automation, follow-ups, task management, and operational system building.



Key Responsibilities



Build and maintain performance and operational reports

Manage and optimize workflows in Notion

Support automation setup and improvements

Track KPIs, targets, and departmental follow-ups

Send reminders and ensure deadlines are met

Help structure and improve SOPs

Assist in cross-department coordination

Proactively identify inefficiencies and suggest improvements





Requirements



Previous experience in operations within a marketing or advertising agency

Strong reporting and analytical skills

Advanced proficiency in Notion

Experience with automation tools (Zapier, Make, etc.)

Excellent written and spoken English

Highly structured, detail-oriented, and proactive

Comfortable working in Paris time and/or EST





Ideal Profile



You are extremely organized and execution-focused

You anticipate problems before they happen

You are comfortable working with leadership and handling confidential information

You take ownership rather than waiting for instructions

title: Full-Time YouTube Video Producer (AI + Real Estate Education)
description:
We are hiring a full-time YouTube Video Producer to manage end-to-end production of a 100% AI avatar-based YouTube channel.



This is NOT just a video editing job.



You will own the full workflow from script to published video.



We publish 3 long-form videos per week.



Brand Context



Our channel is built around a digital AI persona:



Anya — The Oracle of AI



Anya educates homeowners on how to use AI tools to sell their homes smarter and more strategically.



The tone must feel:



Intelligent



Calm



Forward-thinking



Trustworthy



Modern and minimal



This is advisory authority content — not entertainment content.



AI Avatar-Only Production



This channel is 100% AI avatar (HeyGen). There is no live camera footage.



You will be responsible for:



Formatting scripts properly for AI delivery



Removing timestamps and internal notes



Adding pause markers strategically (“…”)



Managing tone and pacing



Rendering high-quality avatar output



Ensuring delivery sounds natural and authoritative



Long-Form Editing (10–20 Minutes)



Enhance avatar footage with relevant B-roll



Add subtle motion graphics and clean text emphasis



Maintain professional pacing (no flashy TikTok style)



Prevent talking-head fatigue



Export in YouTube-ready format (1080p H.264)



AI Writing + Publishing



Use Claude AI to generate:



5 strong YouTube title options



Optimized descriptions with timestamps



 campaign copy



Upload and schedule videos



Add thumbnails, playlists, end screens



Update shared production spreadsheet daily



Performance Awareness



Monitor CTR and retention



Suggest improvements



Help refine pacing based on data



Requirements



Strong English comprehension



Experience editing long-form YouTube content



Skilled in Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or DaVinci



Comfortable learning AI tools



Highly organized and deadline-driven



Able to work independently



This Is NOT For You If:



You prefer flashy editing styles



You only want freelance gigs



You need constant supervision



You cannot commit full-time



Compensation



$1,200 USD per month (full-time)

Performance bonuses available.

Long-term opportunity.



HOW TO APPLY



At the top of your application, write:



ORACLE



Then answer:



Explain your full workflow from receiving a script to publishing a YouTube video.



Share 2–3 long-form videos you edited.



How would you visually present a digital AI persona in a way that feels intelligent and trustworthy — not gimmicky?

title: Sales Development Representative
description:
Company Profile :



First Insight is a leading, product-based healthcare technology company serving eye care practices

across the United States. It is headquartered in Sioux Falls, SD, USA. With over 30 years of innovation

and excellence, we support more than 2,000 eye care professionals across the country.



In 1994, we became the first company to introduce a fully integrated EHR, practice management, and

optical management system specifically designed for optometrists and ophthalmologists — setting a new

standard in the industry.



Today, our global team of over 300 professionals spans offices in the U.S. and India. In addition to

cutting-edge Electronic Health Records (EHR) & Practice Management software and AI-driven clinical

and workflow automation, we offer best-in-class Revenue Cycle Management (RCM) services, helping

healthcare practices nationwide optimize their operations and financial health.



Be part of a company that blends deep industry expertise, innovative technology, and a mission to

improve patient care.



To know more, please visit 
.



Job Summary :



The Sales Development Representative (SDR) will be responsible for generating qualified sales meetings

for sales representatives through outbound prospecting and database-driven research.

This role is focused on pipeline creation, not closing — requiring high-volume outreach, strong research

capability, and disciplined execution of multi-channel prospecting strategies (calls,
s, LinkedIn, other

platforms etc.). The SDR will play a critical role in building top-of-funnel pipeline across First Insight’s

product suite — MaximEyes, Fast Pay Health, and EVAA — targeting U.S. eye care practices.



Job Description :



1) Outbound Prospecting & Lead Generation

*Conduct high-volume outbound outreach (calls,
s, LinkedIn, other platforms etc.) to U.S.- based prospects

*Generate qualified meetings and demos for sales representatives

*Build and manage prospect lists using databases and research tools

*Execute structured outreach sequences and cadences

*Maintain daily activity benchmarks (calls,
s, meetings booked etc.)



2) Market Research & Targeting

*Identify high-value target accounts in U.S. healthcare (optometry & ophthalmology practices)

*Use platforms such as ZoomInfo, Lusha, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, etc.

*Understand clinic workflows, patient journey, and operational challenges

*Develop persona-based outreach for decision-makers (practice owners, administrators)



3) CRM & Pipeline Management

*Maintain accurate and up-to-date records in CRM (HubSpot/Salesforce)

*Track outreach activity, responses, and meeting conversions

*Ensure high data accuracy and pipeline hygiene

*Collaborate with marketing on lead qualification and scoring



4) Messaging & Outreach Optimization

*Develop personalized outreach messaging to improve response rates

*Continuously refine
 templates, call scripts, and sequences

*A/B test messaging approaches to improve engagement

*Align messaging with product value propositions and market needs



5) Collaboration with Sales & Marketing

*Work closely with U.S.-based sales representatives to align on target accounts

*Support campaign execution and follow-ups from marketing initiatives

*Provide feedback on lead quality, messaging effectiveness, and market insights

*Contribute to improving SDR playbooks and outreach processes



Job Requirements :



Experience:

? *1–4 years of experience in SDR / BDR / inside sales (preferably B2B SaaS)

? *Experience in outbound prospecting for U.S. markets preferred

? *Proven track record of meeting or exceeding outreach and meeting-booking targets

? *Exposure to healthcare, SaaS, or technology sales is a plus



Functional Skills:

? *Strong cold calling and
 outreach skills

? *Experience with CRM tools (Salesforce, HubSpot, or similar)

? *Familiarity with sales engagement platforms (Outreach, Salesloft, etc.)

? *Experience using data tools (ZoomInfo, 6sense, Lusha, LinkedIn Sales Navigator)

? *Ability to research accounts and personalize outreach



Performance Metrics:

? *Daily/weekly call and
 activity

? *Meetings/demos booked for sales team

? *SQL (Sales Qualified Lead) generation

? *Conversion rates across outreach stages



Soft Skills:

? *Excellent verbal and written English communication (U.S. accent preferred)

? *Strong research and analytical thinking

? *High energy, persistence, and resilience in outbound sales

? *Process-oriented with attention to detail

? *Ability to work in a fast-paced, target-driven environment

title: Senior E-commerce Media Buyer (Fashion – UK Market) – Testing, Creative & Scaling Expert
description:
Description:



We are a growing premium fashion brand expanding aggressively into the UK market and are looking for a high-level media buyer who understands fashion, creatives, and scaling winning ads.



This is NOT a beginner role.



We are looking for someone who can:

• Test products strategically

• Create high-converting ad creatives

• Launch structured campaigns

• Identify winning ads

• Scale profitably (vertically & horizontally)

• Understand the UK fashion audience



You must have proven experience in fashion e-commerce.



?



???? Responsibilities



• Product testing strategy (angle testing, hook testing, offer testing)

• Create ad creatives (UGC style, fashion edits, luxury vibe)

• Write strong direct-response ad copy

• Set up campaigns correctly (Meta preferred)

• Analyze data (CPC, CPA, CTR, ATC, ROAS)

• Kill losers fast, scale winners properly

• Manage budgets efficiently

• Understand UK customer psychology



?



???? Requirements



• 2+ years Meta Ads experience (E-commerce)

• Experience in fashion / apparel niche

• Strong creative sense (luxury / feminine / premium branding)

• Knows how to scale from £50/day to £500+/day profitably

• Can edit videos or guide creative team

• Data-driven but creative minded

• Fluent English



Bonus:

• Experience with Klaviyo
 marketing

• Experience with Shopify

• Experience scaling in the UK market



?



???? Payment Structure



Open to:

• Fixed monthly retainer + performance bonus

or

• % of profit / ROAS-based incentive



We are building long term — not short term.



?



???? To Apply



Send:

 1. Case studies (fashion brands preferred)

 2. Screenshot proof of ad accounts

 3. ROAS examples

 4. Explain your testing framework

 5. Explain how you scale winning ads



Start your message with: “UK FASHION SCALE”

(So we know you read everything.)

title: Marketing Assistant: Designer, Project Manager
description:
Online digital marketing agency seeking a Creative Designer + Project Manager.



MUST ACTUALLY WANT TO WORK

If you get overwhelmed easily, this is NOT the job for you



The Creative Project Manager supports the Account Manager by coordinating, executing, and organizing creative and digital projects across multiple client accounts.



REQUIREMENTS:

- Must speak, write fluent English

- Must work US Eastern Hours (M-F 9-5)

- Must be HIGHLY organized

- Must have EXCELLENT communication skills

- Must be experienced in Google Workspace, Canva, Slack, ClickUp, GoHighlevel

- Must have previous Design experience (Canva)



If you do not fit ALL of the above - Do NOT proceed



====================



This role plays a key part in translating strategy into action - ensuring creative assets, content, and campaigns are delivered on time, on brand, and aligned with client goals.



We are looking for a highly organized, communicative individual who can manage workflows, collaborate closely with Account Managers, and confidently assist with client-facing communication when needed.



This role requires both creative thinking and strong operational skills.



---



OBJECTIVE



The objective of this role is to manage creative execution and project coordination under the direction of the Account Manager, ensuring seamless collaboration between internal teams and, when applicable, clients.



The Creative Project Manager helps maintain clear timelines, consistent brand storytelling, and smooth communication across all creative initiatives.



---



RESPONSIBILITIES



Work directly under the Account Manager to execute creative strategies and manage day-to-day project workflows



Maintain clear, consistent communication with the Account Manager regarding timelines, priorities, and deliverables



Coordinate creative projects across social media, content, and digital marketing channels



Oversee organic and paid social media campaigns, ensuring content is aligned with approved strategy and brand voice



Manage content creation across formats including written, visual, and multimedia assets



Organize project timelines, task assignments, and approvals using ClickUp



Collaborate cross-functionally with Account Managers, Ad Managers, and creative tea
mbers



Communicate with clients when needed to clarify deliverables, timelines, or feedback



Utilize Canva, ChatGPT, Gemini, and WordPress to support content creation and execution



Monitor content and social media trends, platform updates, and creative best practices



Support
 marketing and promotional content initiatives



Maintain internal communication using Slack and documentation using Google Workspace



---



REQUIRED SKILLS



Exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail absolutely REQUIRED



Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to collaborate internally and communicate professionally with clients



Proficiency in Canva and Google Workspace



Working knowledge of ChatGPT, Gemini, and WordPress



Familiarity with ClickUp, Slack, Meta Business Suite, and social media scheduling platforms



---



REQUIRED KNOWLEDGE



Understanding of how content and social media support conversions, traffic, and brand growth



Basic knowledge of SEO and web content optimization



---



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE



Minimum 3 year of experience in creative project management, social media management, or content coordination



Experience managing multiple projects and deadlines simultaneously



Experience or interest in medical aesthetics, wellness, or healthcare preferred



---



HOW TO APPLY



Submit the following:

- Introduction and summary of fit

- Resume

- Design Portfolio



If you believe you are the absolute best fit for this role, then please proceed with applying by sending an
 to accounts at medspabloom dot com and include the above listed items. In addition, include a photo of your pet or desired pet to show that you actually read this entire job description and know how to follow instructions. Make your subject line one word and that word is strawberry. Anyone who does not follow these instructions will not be considered since it will be shown that you actually do not have any attention to detail and cannot properly follow instructions, which is important for this role.

title: AI Operations Engineer
description:
JOB DESCRIPTION



Position Title: AI Operations Engineer

Department: Operations / Marketing

Reports To: Agency Owner

Location: New York (Remote/Hybrid)

Employment Type: Full-Time



About the Company

We are a growing marketing and SEO agency based in New York, serving local and e-commerce brands. Our lean, high-performing team of five specializes in design, SEO, marketing strategy, finance, and CRM management. We are committed to leveraging AI-powered tools and automation to deliver exceptional results for our clients while maximizing internal efficiency.



About the Role

This is not a traditional operations position. We are looking for an AI Operations Engineer who will design, build, and manage AI agents and automated workflows that replace and enhance manual operational tasks across the agency. You will start by automating executive assistant functions and then expand to build agentic AI solutions for SEO, design, marketing, finance, and CRM workflows used by the entire team.



The ideal candidate is someone who thinks in systems, is deeply familiar with no-code AI platforms, and can architect intelligent automations that save hours of repetitive work each week.



Key Responsibilities

 • Design and deploy AI agents using no-code platforms such as n8n, Zapier, Claude, Claude Code, Notion and make to automate executive assistant tasks including scheduling, communications, reporting, and task management.

 • Build agentic AI workflows that handle SEO research, keyword tracking, content optimization, and reporting tasks with minimal human oversight.

 • Develop and maintain automated processes for CRM management, client onboarding, lead nurturing, and pipeline tracking.

 • Create AI-powered automations for marketing workflows including social media scheduling,
 campaigns, and performance reporting.

 • Work with each tea
mber to identify repetitive tasks and build tailored AI agents to streamline their work.

 • Architect and manage prompt engineering strategies to ensure consistent, high-quality AI outputs across all workflows.

 • Document all automations, workflows, and AI agent configurations so the team can understand and maintain them.

 • Stay current with emerging AI tools, platforms, and best practices to continuously improve the agency’s automation capabilities.

 • Monitor and troubleshoot existing automations to ensure reliability and accuracy.

 • Support light operational and administrative tasks as needed during the transition to full automation.



Required Qualifications

 • Proven experience building AI agents and automated workflows using no-code tools such as n8n, Zapier, Make or similar platforms.

 • Strong proficiency with AI platforms including Claude, ChatGPT, and other large language model tools.

 • Demonstrated skill in prompt engineering and designing multi-step AI agent workflows.

 • Excellent understanding of business operations, particularly in a marketing or agency environment.

 • Ability to map complex manual processes and translate them into reliable automated systems.

 • Strong organizational skills and ability to manage multiple automation projects simultaneously.

 • Clear English and communication skills with the ability to explain technical workflows to non-technical tea
mbers.

 • Self-motivated, proactive, and comfortable working independently in a small team environment.



Preferred Qualifications

 • Experience with Claude Code or similar AI-assisted coding tools.

 • Familiarity with SEO tools and workflows (e.g., Ahrefs, SEMrush, Google Search Console). 

 • Experience with CRM platforms (e.g., HubSpot, GoHighLevel, Salesforce).

 • Knowledge of marketing automation platforms and
 marketing tools.

 • Background in operations management, project management, or executive support.

 • Experience working in or with digital marketing agencies. Add ops26 to be considered on application.



Tools & Platforms

AI & Automation: Claude, ChatGPT, n8n, Zapier, Claude Code (bonus)

SEO & Marketing: Various SEO and marketing platforms as used by the team

Operations: CRM systems (Go High Level), project management tools (Notion), communication platforms



Why Join Us

 • Be at the forefront of AI-driven agency operations — this role is shaping the future of how our agency works.

 • High autonomy and direct impact in a small, collaborative team.

 • Opportunity to build systems from the ground up and see your work drive real efficiency gains.

 • Work with a team that embraces AI and innovation as core to how we operate.

 • Competitive compensation commensurate with experience.



How to Apply

Please submit your resume along with examples of AI automations or agentic workflows you have built. We are particularly interested in seeing real-world projects where you used no-code AI tools to solve operational challenges. A brief description of your approach and the results achieved will help us understand your capabilities. 



Pay: $
(negotiable on experience)

title: Beauty Affiliate & Influencer Revenue Manager (TikTok-Focused | Beauty | Performance-Based)
description:
Perfectanist is a luxury, dermatologist-approved self-tan brand seeking a revenue-focused Affiliate & Influencer Revenue Manager. This is not a general social media role. The purpose of this position is to generate measurable sales through TikTok and Instagram creator partnerships.

If you have not directly driven revenue from influencer or affiliate campaigns, this role is not a fit.

Primary Objective

Drive trackable revenue through strategic influencer sourcing, onboarding, and affiliate management.

Responsibilities

• Manually source aligned beauty and skincare creators from TikTok and Instagram (not just influencer platforms)

• Evaluate engagement quality, audience demographics, and authenticity

• Conduct outreach, negotiate terms, and onboard creators

• Structure commission-based affiliate partnerships

• Manage TikTok Shop and discount code tracking

• Ensure creators post on schedule and follow up consistently

• Secure high-performing UGC for paid ad usage

• Provide weekly performance reports including revenue, conversions, CPA, and ROI

Requirements

• Proven experience generating revenue through influencer or affiliate campaigns

• Strong understanding of conversion metrics (CPA, AOV, ROAS, conversion rate)

• Experience sourcing creators manually on TikTok

• Ability to identify fake engagement and low-quality accounts

• Beauty or skincare experience preferred

Structure

• 15–20 hours per week

• 30-day paid trial

• Hourly base + performance bonus tied to revenue



To Apply

Include the following in your application:

Total revenue generated from your most recent influencer or affiliate campaign

Conversion rate from that campaign

Commission structure used

Specific sourcing process you used to find creators

Step-by-step plan to generate 100 sales in 30 days for Perfectanist's micromist

Links to two creators you sourced that generated sales

Applications without performance metrics will not be reviewed.

title: DME Order Processor
description:
The Job



Process durable medical equipment orders from prescription to delivery. You’ll manage 50-100+ patient orders at a time, making sure everything is documented correctly and delivered on time.



What You’ll Do:



 ? Call patients to confirm orders and delivery information

 ? Order equipment from suppliers and track shipments

 ? Keep detailed records in our systems

 ? Follow up on prescriptions when needed

 ? Make sure all documentation is complete and saved properly



Requirements

Must Have:



 ? DME experience (medical equipment, orthopedic supplies, or similar)

 ? Excellent English for phone calls with US patients

 ? Extremely detail-oriented - you never skip steps

 ? Comfortable with computers and learning new systems

 ? Reliable internet and quiet workspace

 ? Available US business hours

Bonus:

 ? Insurance verification experience

 ? Pharmacy or medical office background

 ? HIPAA knowledge



What We’re Looking For



Someone who follows processes exactly, takes ownership of their work, speaks up when something’s wrong, and understands that documentation is everything.



To Apply Send:

 1. Your resume

 2. Voice recording (2-3 minutes) answering these questions:

Questions to answer in your recording:

 ? Describe your DME experience - what products did you work with and what was your role?

 ? A patient’s delivery address changed after you already ordered their equipment. What steps do you take?

 ? You’ve called a doctor’s office twice for a prescription and got no response. What do you do next?

 ? How do you stay organized when managing 75+ orders at the same time?

 ? Why do you want this position?

title: Lead Qualification Specialist - DME Healthcare
description:
The Job

Call people who filled out
 forms asking about medical equipment (knee braces, back braces, etc.). Your job is simple:



Call them

Ask if they still want it

Ask basic questions (name, insurance info, etc.)

Get their permission to check insurance

Pass them to the insurance team



That's it.



What You'll Do Every Day

Full-Time: Make
calls per day

Part-Time: Make 50-60 calls per 4-hour shift



Call leads from our system

Follow up every day for 7 days if they don't answer

Type their info into our CRM (GoHighLevel)

Move them to the next team when qualified



What We Need From You

? Speak excellent English (you're calling Americans all day)

? Experience making 50+ outbound calls per day

? Comfortable with rejection and people not answering

? Fast typer (you document while you talk)

? Reliable internet (15+ Mbps minimum)

? Quiet place to work

? Available during US Central Time hours

Bonus if you have:



Healthcare or medical background

Call center/BPO experience

Used GoHighLevel or CRMs before





What You Get

? Consistent schedule - same hours every week

???? Work from home

???? Clear targets - you always know what's expected

???? Simple role - just qualify and pass to next team



How To Apply

1. Send your resume

2. Answer these questions:



How many calls per day have you made in previous jobs?

Do you have healthcare or medical experience?

Which schedule do you want? (Full-time 40hrs OR Part-time 20hrs)

Can you work US Central Time hours?



3. Record a 2-minute voice sample:



Pretend you're calling someone who asked about a knee brace

Introduce yourself

Ask if they still want the knee brace

Ask if they have insurance

Upload to Google Drive or Dropbox and send us the link



Subject line: "Lead Qualifier - [Your Name]"



Start Date

Immediate - we're hiring now.



This is high-volume outbound calling. You will be on the phone all day. If you don't like calling people, this isn't for you.

title: Virtual Assistant - Credit Repair & Business Funding Specialist
description:
About Our Company



FundCharm is a growing credit repair and funding solutions company dedicated to helping individuals and businesses improve their credit profiles and access funding opportunities. We're expanding our operations and need a skilled professional to manage our credit repair customer service operations and marketing automation systems.



Position Overview



We are seeking an experienced Credit Repair Customer Service Specialist with expertise in DisputeFox to manage client consultations, onboarding, and marketing automation. This role combines customer service excellence with technical marketing skills to support our growing credit repair division.

Key Responsibilities



Credit Repair Operations



Conduct professional credit consultations with clients

Manage client onboarding process using DisputeFox

Review credit reports and explain findings to clients

Guide clients through dispute processes and credit improvement strategies

Track client progress and provide ongoing support

Handle customer inquiries with professionalism and expertise



Sales & Client Management



Conduct sales consultations and close credit repair services

Understand and explain funding options to clients

Guide clients through funding sequences

Maintain high customer satisfaction and retention rates

Upsell additional services when appropriate



GoHighLevel (GHL) Management a plus



Build and optimize sales pipelines in GHL

Create and manage marketing automation workflows

Set up
 and SMS campaigns

Track leads through various pipeline stages

Generate reports on conversion rates and pipeline performance

Integrate DisputeFox with GHL systems



Marketing Support



Develop nurture sequences for different client segments

Create follow-up campaigns for consultations and onboarding

Monitor campaign performance and optimize for conversions

Coordinate marketing efforts with sales activities



Required Qualifications



Must Have:



Proven experience in credit repair (minimum 1-2 years)

Strong understanding of credit reports, scoring, and dispute processes

Hands-on experience with DisputeFox for client onboarding

Advanced GoHighLevel (GHL) skills including pipeline management and automation

Sales experience with demonstrated ability to close deals

Knowledge of funding processes and funding sequences

Excellent English communication skills (written and verbal)

Professional phone manner for client consultations

Self-motivated and able to work independently

Stable internet connection and professional home office setup



Strongly Preferred:



Business credit experience - this is a HUGE plus

Experience with business funding and tradeline building

Knowledge of business credit reporting agencies (Dun & Bradstreet, Experian Business, Equifax Business)

Customer service experience in financial services

Experience integrating multiple software platforms



Technical Skills Required



GoHighLevel (pipelines, automation, workflows, campaigns)

DisputeFox platform

CRM management

title: Zoho Specialist
description:
Join Our Growth Journey: Zoho CRM & Campaigns Specialist (Remote, Flexible Hours)



About Us



We’re a fast-growing, forward-thinking company based in Vancouver, BC — but our team is spread far and wide. Innovation, integrity, and continuous improvement aren’t just words on a wall for us — they’re how we work and grow every day. We’re looking for someone who shares our mindset and knows how to bring Zoho CRM and Zoho Campaigns to life in ways that truly move the needle.



Why This Role Is Exciting?



If you're a Zoho whiz who loves building systems that actually make a difference — this is your 
nt. We’re offering a flexible, part-time or project-based opportunity where your ideas are valued, your skills are trusted, and your schedule is respected.



We’re not just looking for someone to “keep the lights on.” We want a partner to help us unlock the full potential of Zoho, streamline our sales and marketing workflows, and ensure that we’re always one step ahead in how we engage with our customers.



What You'll Do



>>> Customize & optimize Zoho CRM to support our evolving business needs

>>> Design and manage
 campaigns using Zoho Campaigns that actually get results

>>> Analyze CRM data to help us better understand our customers and their journeys

>>> Train and support our internal team so everyone can thrive using Zoho tools

>>> Troubleshoot, configure, build, and refine—you're the go-to Zoho expert

>>> Recommend smarter ways to use dashboards, workflows, integrations, SMS/email campaigns and more



What We're Looking For



- Hands-on experience with Zoho CRM and Zoho Campaigns (customization is your jam)

- Strategic thinker who loves turning messy processes into clean, scalable systems

- Comfortable working independently and communicating clearly in a remote environment

- Familiarity with tools like Asana (or other project management software)

- Someone who genuinely enjoys sharing knowledge and helping others get the most out of their tools



Perks & Benefits



- Flexible hours — work when you’re most productive

- Remote-first culture — work from anywhere

- Competitive pay (part
 basis)

- Potential for long-term collaboration and future projects

- A small, nimble, and supportive team that values your input



How to Apply:



We want to get to know you more, please send us:



- Your updated resume

- 1-minute introduction video that tells us:

- Your experience with Zoho CRM and Zoho Campaigns, especially around buildouts

- Your availability (we’re looking for someone to contribute 5–10 hours/month)



Whether you feel confident reviewing our existing Zoho setup and offering expert guidance on ways to improve (e.g., dashboards, automations, integrations, campaigns, etc.)



Let’s build something great together. If you're excited to leave a real impact and love making systems sing, we can’t wait to meet you.

title: Marketing Designer
description:
Marketing Designer

Bandou • Full-Time • Remote

$3,000 USD / Monthly



About Bandou:

Bandou is a fast-growing children’s headphone brand. We hold official licensing deals with

major globally recognized brands, with more in the pipeline. We sell direct-to-consumer and

are expanding into wholesale and retail. Our team is lean, remote-first, and moves fast.



The Role:



We’re looking for a Marketing Designer who combines strong visual execution with genuine

commercial instinct and exceptional organizational skills. You’ll own our marketing creative output

across every channel and touchpoint.



This is a full-time individual role. We are not looking for agencies, studios, or contractors juggling

multiple clients. We want one person who is fully committed to Bandou and treats this brand like their

own.



The right person sees what needs to be done, plans ahead, flags deadlines before they’re missed,

and brings ideas to the table unprompted. If you thrive in structured environments that you help

create, this is for you.



What You’ll Own:



Visual Design & Creative Execution

You’ll be the creative engine behind our marketing visuals. This includes some ad creatives,

campaign assets, homepage banners, product imagery, pitch decks for retail and wholesale

partners, and any other visual touchpoint the brand needs. You produce work that is both visually

strong and commercially effective - you understand that great design in marketing exists to drive

action, not just to look good.

You’re highly proficient with Adobe Creative Suite and comfortable working with .ai files. You know

when and how to use AI tools to speed up your workflow - but you don’t lean on them as a crutch.



Marketing Calendar & Campaign Ownership

You own the marketing calendar. You know what’s coming, what needs to be built, and when it

needs to be ready — and you make sure it happens. You manage seasonal campaigns, product

launches, and ad hoc needs without needing to be reminded or followed up with.



When a campaign is on the horizon, you’re already thinking about what assets are needed, what the

creative angle should be, and how to make it perform. You bring that thinking to the founder, not the

other way around.



Who We’re Looking For:

? Proven graphic design skills with a portfolio that shows real marketing work - ad creatives,

campaign assets, promotional materials (not just logos and branding)

? Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite, including working with .ai files

? Exceptional organizational skills - you manage your own deadlines, maintain a clear

calendar, and never drop the ball

? Proactive by nature - you identify what needs to be done and do it, without waiting to be

asked

? Commercially minded - you understand what drives clicks and conversions, not just what

looks nice

? Perfect written English - you’ll be communicating professionally with external partners and

stakeholders

? Experience at a digital marketing or creative agency is a strong plus

? Familiarity with Shopify, Figma, or similar tools is a bonus



What We Offer:

? $3,000 USD monthly ($1,500 USD paid bi-weekly)

? 100% remote

? Single brand focus

? Work on fun, globally recognized children’s brands

? A small, no-BS team that trusts you to own your work

? Real growth opportunity as the brand scales



How to Apply:



Send your portfolio and a short note (3–5 sentences) on why this role is a fit to


 last thing: start your
 subject line with “Pew Pew ????” - it’s how we’ll know you

actually read this. Applications without it will not be reviewed.

title: DTC Email Designer
description:
We’re hiring a full-time Graphic Designer to elevate our creative output with a primary focus on performance-driven creatives in Klaviyo. This role is full-time and in-house (remote). We're not hiring freelance or agency.



This role is ideal for someone who is creative but performance-aware — someone who understands that good design is not just about aesthetics, but about driving clicks, conversions, and revenue.



What You’ll Be Responsible For

- Create landing page visuals, banners,
 graphics, and other DTC marketing assets

- Edit and optimise website product images 

- Develop new creative concepts and designs based on performance data and brand direction

- Produce variations of winning creatives for testing (different headlines, layouts, visuals, offers)

- Collaborate effectively with the Copywriter to iterate based on performance insights

- Participate in brainstorming sessions to improve angles, messaging, and hooks

- Monitor competitors’ designs to identify gaps or opportunities

- Upskill on DTC creative trends and platform best practices



Requirements

- Full-time remote, Monday–Friday (9am–5pm PH time)

- Strong visual design fundamentals (layout, hierarchy, typography, color)

- Able to design with e-commerce marketing intent, not just aesthetics

- Comfortable creating multiple variations quickly for testing

- Highly organized, execution-focused, independent

- Skills in Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma (3D jewelry rendering experience is a huge plus)

- Experience with Klaviyo and Shopify 

- Basic understanding of DTC copywriting 



What We Offer

- Fully remote with competitive salary

- Performance-based bonuses

- Paid annual leave & public holidays (following local PH calendar)

- Training, upskilling, and career growth opportunities

- A team that values ownership, clarity, and results



Application

Please send your application via
 to 
 with the subject line: "DTC
 Designer – (Your Name)”. Include your OnlineJobsPH profile link and answers to the questions below in numbered format directly in the
 body:

1) Tell us about your most recent job. What did you mainly work on, what were some challenges you faced, and why did you d
 to leave?

2) Tell us about the tools you used, your process, and results relevant to this role. 

3) Share a time you took initiative or solved a problem in your workplace. It doesn’t have to be a formal leadership role, just something you’re proud of.

4) Please submit as much of your portfolio as possible. Submitting more work will help us make a more informed decision. Work can include anything within DTC e-commerce industry, but ideally aligned to the role you are applying for. If you don’t have DTC experience, submit your best work portfolio. Strong portfolios outside this role may be considered for other roles. 

5) Pick one project from the attached portfolio in question (4) that you are most proud of and answer the questions below. We want to see your ability to clearly explain what you did, your role, your reasoning, and the results of your work. You may optionally pick more than 1 project to highlight additional skills.

- What the project was

- Your specific contribution

- Why you approached it this way

- The results or impact (if any)



Keywords

jewelry graphic designer, e-commerce graphic designer, DTC graphic designer, performance creative,
 ads creative,

title: Senior GoHighLevel (GHL) Build Expert – Full-Time
description:
To apply 



We are a performance-focused marketing company looking to bring on a senior-level GoHighLevel (GHL) Build Expert to work full-time, in-house, alongside one of the original GoHighLevel trainers. This role is for someone who truly understands how to architect, build, and scale advanced GHL systems for real marketing environments. We are not interested in hiring agencies, white-label teams, or outsourced firms. This position is for an individual expert with a proven track record.



This role is fully remote, but candidates must be available to work consistently during AV / EST business hours. Excellent, near-perfect English communication skills are required, both written and spoken, as you will be collaborating closely with leadership and internal teams on system design and execution.



As our GoHighLevel Build Expert, you will be responsible for turning marketing strategy into fully functional, scalable GHL systems. This includes designing complete account structures, building funnels and websites inside GoHighLevel, creating and executing advanced workflow automation plans, and implementing API-driven integrations. You will be expected to think in systems, not just features, and to plan automation logic thoroughly before building. Clean structure, clear logic, and long-term maintainability are critical in this role.



You will regularly build high-converting websites, funnels, and landing pages directly inside GoHighLevel, including forms, surveys, calendars, booking logic, membership areas, and payment flows using Stripe. You should understand how these components work together to support lead generation, appointment setting, onboarding, and fulfillment for marketing clients. Speed, mobile responsiveness, and user experience are expected standards, not afterthoughts.



A major part of this role involves workflow strategy and execution. You must be able to design complex automation systems that handle lead intake, pipeline movement, appointment reminders, follow-ups via SMS,
, voi
, and AI, internal task assignment, reactivation campaigns, and client onboarding. You will be responsible for building workflows that are efficient, reliable, and easy to debug, as well as optimizing and refactoring existing automations as systems evolve.



Strong technical capability is required. You should be comfortable working with the GoHighLevel API, webhooks, and third-party automation tools such as Zapier or Make. You will be expected to integrate GoHighLevel with external tools including CRMs, payment processors,
 platforms, membership systems, and tracking tools, while understanding data flow, API limits, and error handling. This is not a surface-level integration role; deep understanding is required.



You will work closely with one of the original GoHighLevel trainers, as well as with internal marketing strategists and operators. Clear communication, ownership of your work, and the ability to execute without hand-holding are essential. This role requires someone who can take direction, apply strategic thinking, and deliver high-quality builds consistently.



To be considered, you must have advanced, real-world GoHighLevel experience with verifiable examples of complex systems you have built. You must be able to demonstrate a strong track record, provide references, and clearly explain how you have handled workflow complexity, integrations, and scalable system design in past roles. This position is not suitable for beginners, template-only builders, or anyone still learning GoHighLevel fundamentals.



In return, this role offers long-term stability, direct access to top-tier GHL expertise, and the opportunity to build serious systems that directly impact client success and company growth. If you are a true GoHighLevel expert who takes pride in clean builds, smart automation, and scalable architecture, we want to hear from you.

title: Medical Virtual Assistant - Spine Surgery
description:
Job Title: Medical Virtual Assistant – Spine Surgery

Position type: Full-Time

Work hours: 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM Pacific Time (PST)

Work days: Monday – Friday

Salary: $5 – $6 per hour (depending on experience)





Role Overview

The Medical Virtual Assistant will support a Spine Surgery practice by managing insurance authorizations, handling appeals, navigating insurance portals, and coordinating documentation. The ideal candidate is proactive, detail-oriented, and experienced in dealing directly with insurance companies.



This position requires:

-Strong call management skills

-Real-time client interaction

-Care coordination

-Proactive problem-solving with minimal supervision



Key Responsibilities

Priority 1: 

-Surgery Authorization Handling

-Manage and process surgery authorizations for orthopedic spine procedures

-Submit clinical documentation to insurance providers

-Track authorization status and follow up as needed

-Ensure timely approval to avoid surgery delays



Priority 2:

-Navigate various insurance portals efficiently

-Gain and manage access to insurance platforms

-Upload documentation and track submissions

-Monitor portal communications and updates



Priority 3:

Additional Responsibilities

Systems & Tools Used

-Google Workspace: Especially Google Sheets

-Communication Tools: Slack, Salesforce, WhatsApp,
, Microsoft Teams

-Phone System: Internet-based system (managed by IT)

-CR
ssaging Platforms



Must-Have Requirements

-Surgery Authorization Experience (must have prior hands-on experience)

-Insurance Company Communication Skills

-Strong Understanding of Authorization & Appeals Process

-Experience with EHR systems (Athena, EPIC, Cerner)

-Ability to work independently with minimal supervision



Technical Skills Required

-Insurance portal navigation

-Surgery authorization processing

-Insurance appeals handling

-Spine surgery coding knowledge

-Prior authorization management

-Insurance company communication

-Proficiency with Google Sheets and documentation tracking



Nice-to-Have (Not Deal Breakers)

How to Apply?

-Please send your google drive link with your resume. Make sure it's public.

title: Virtual Executive Assistant
description:
I'm the founder of a digital growth marketing company that helps mission-driven founders scale their businesses with more ease & less overwhelm - and I'm looking for a small team of highly-skilled Executive Assistants to help take over the marketing and management tasks that make a huge difference in the lives of the people that hire us.



I'm looking for a max of 5 amazing executive assistants available for part-time (potential for full time) with a salary starting at $500 USD per month and with long term success and robust training, moving up to $700 USD per month as an emerging leader in the company.



If you have the following skill sets, I encourage you to apply:



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE:

- Minimum of 3–5 years of experience in Digital Marketing, Video Editing, Social Media Management, Content Creation, and Executive Assistant Work (Administrative Tasks, Calendar &
 Management, etc)

You’re trusted to manage marketing deliverables while providing high-level executive support, keeping priorities organized, systems moving, and leadership focused on growth instead of day-to-day execution. You've done it all from managing schedules to
 & calendar management. You have a meticulous eye for detail where Prioritization and Organization are your love language



- 1+ years of experience in Sales Funnels and Shopify

You're a professional who is passionate about helping changemakers simplify their lives by setting up systems that will allow them to operate their businesses with more ease and less overwhelm. You have experience with sales funnel and CRM software



- 1+ years of experience advertising on platforms like Instagram,
, Tik Tok, within a Marketing team consisting of Paid Acquisition, Organic Marketing, Customer Retention, & Product Marketing

You're an emerging leader who has the potential to head a team in the future that will report directly to you. Having leadership experience is a MAJOR plus



- Creating SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures)

You’ll ensure each business function has detailed documentation for repeatable and scalable growth if it isn't already place. If you see gaps, you take the initiative to fill them and produce results without anyone knowing there was an issue (yea, all that and a bag of chips :-)



- Experience working at a digital/online product/platform: You’re familiar with online courses, digital products & platforms and popular tools in the business space ranging from landing page builders and
 service providers to CRMs, and course hosting platforms aren’t foreign to you (We teach tools like Shopify, Convertkit, Kajabi, Teachable, Learnworlds, Calendly, etc)



ABOUT YOU:

- “You down with SOP? Yeah you know me!”—You’re an advocate for SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) to make our systems repeatable & scalable.

- Your love language is processes & predictable, meteoric growth. We never question company progress towards the quarterly and yearly goals because you keep real-time metrics for all projects.

- You’re aware of new software and can look at current systems and identify how to automate tasks a company has been doing manually for months.

- You’re addicted to digital processes & automation in the world of social media because you love building connections in the digital space and you’ve seen how powerful it can be in business growth

- You’re driven by metrics & tracking. You know that you can’t improve something unless you measure it, so you develop ways to measure performance so your company is always predictably improving.

- Timeliness and deadlines are your jam. When we have a team call at 10:00am, you show up at 9:55am. When the deadline is Tuesday at 5:30pm, you have it done Monday.

- You overcommunicate clearly and confidently. If you agree/disagree with something, you communicate that without hesitation or overthinking. You’re no stranger to asking why we do things a certain way to ensure we’re intentional with our resources.

- You’re a leader and team player. Ego? What ego? If something needs to be done, you dive in to make sure all critical tasks are accounted and cared for.



If you’re nodding your head “Yes” to the above, proceed below to apply.



PERKS:

I'm committed to setting our staff up for success with access to trainings that will certify your skills in:

- Task & Calendar Management

- Launch/Sales Strategy Planning

- Sales Funnel Tech Setup (For E-Commerce or Service Based Businesses)

- Social Media Management

- Digital Media Marketing (Including
 and SMS Marketing)

- Lead Generation



After one week of training and assessment, you're officially certified under our internal training program, which means hitting the ground running with your new skills. Perks include:

- Part time work hours

- Work from anywhere in the world (as long as your internet signal is strong and computer is fast)

- Starting Salary at $500 USD a month ($6000 USD annual)

- Internal certification program to enhance your professional skills in your career (I have helped clients amass at least $10M from the same digital growth marketing strategies I will require you to learn)



Interested? Please reply to this post with the secret keyword "APPLES" so I know you can pay attention to detail - from there, I'll let you know next steps if you qualify.

title: Graphic Design & Social Media Manager
description:
A growing and successful marketing agency is looking to add a full time Graphic Design & Social Media Manager to join our amazing staff! We are looking for a brilliant, organized individual who has the aptitude to perform creative-based tasks at a reasonable pace, understands the value of hard work, and wants to grow with the company. Please watch this video before applying: 
/share/bced6c7d309b423989fac1d65542b7e5



About Us

We are a growing digital marketing agency specializing in full-service marketing solutions. Our team operates with a 100% collaborative approach where we value innovation, initiative, and continuous improvement. We're expanding rapidly and creating excellent opportunities for growth and advancement within our team.



About This Role

We're looking for a creative visual storyteller who can manage social media presence and create compelling graphics across multiple platforms. This role combines graphic design expertise and social media management. You'll be responsible for bringing our clients' brands to life through engaging visual content while managing their social media presence strategically.



What You'll Be Doing:

Primary Responsibilities:

- Lead creative and design for multiple client accounts for use in traditional media (billboards, direct mail, etc.) and digital campaigns (social media, display ads, etc)

- Create and schedule social media posts and advertisements across multiple platforms

- Create AI-generated images for blog content

- Schedule and manage social posts 

- Design logos and brand materials as requested



Secondary Responsibilities:

- Support team with general tasks as assigned when capacity is available in your schedule



What We're Looking For:

- Someone who embraces our three-step approach: Learn how we do it, do it yourself, then figure out how to do it better

- Creative thinker who can balance multiple design projects while maintaining brand consistency

- Social media savvy professional who understands platform-specific best practices

- Proactive communicator who brings fresh creative ideas to the table

- Team player who thrives in a collaborative, fast-paced environment

- Detail-oriented designer who can manage deadlines across multiple clients

- Someone who wants to learn, grown and excel within a growing agency



Qualifications:

Required:

- Strong graphic design portfolio demonstrating versatility across digital and print media

- Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite and Canva

- Ability to learn and manage AI image generation tools 

- Proven social media management experience across multiple platforms

- Understanding of brand consistency and visual storytelling

- Strong written English communication skills

- Proficiency with: Google Sheets,
, ChatGPT, ClickUp

- Ability to work 7 a.m. - 3 p.m. CST



Preferred:

- Video editing skills

nt they enquire, supporting them throughout their booking journey and enhancing their overall dining experience.
