title: Social Media Posting Specialist (Tech Driven, Detail Driven)
description:
I'm a consultant looking to recruit this position for a client. 



This client is an Emmy award winning video production agency who works with big US corporations and organizations (such as US Army, Nasdaq, and more). 



They have a product where they create for C-suite exectives super high quality video shorts for posting on social media and help them create and launch podcasts.



They are in need of an INCREDIBLY detail oriented AND technical / problem solving oriented person with experience in social posting. 



RESPONSIBILITIES of the role are: 

- Onboard clients by getting client info promptly, and helping setup accounts -- gathering all login info to socials, handling 2FA and password manager, and helping setup podcast accounts (spotify, apple podcasts, etc)

- Consistently post video content on behalf of clients, using our AI to create captions, titles... and being creative in writing the posts for clients (less AI, this is where the creative part comes in)

- Troubleshoot posting issues / technical issues as they arise to ensure posts go out of time, are orderly, and all details and processes are clear and accounted for -- goal is zero issues that escalate because you are a competent problem solver

- Any other tasks necessary to ensure great posting and success for a client



SKILLS / EXPERIENCE that is ideal: 

- Technical troubleshooting and "figuring it out" abilities when it comes to social media, tech, and podcast posting

- Social media and podcast experience - meta, youtube, spotify, apple podcast, etc

- Customer experience - OK with connecting with C-suite VIP's to get info

- Improvement oriented - love making processes better and working to build better along with a team

- Detail oriented - you don't let details slip and are always keeping eyes on the details

- Video skill / video editing - any experience or willingness to learn in this realm is helpful as it's our business!



ABOUT THIS ROLE

This role is a full time role, and you would report to our operations director (also Filipines, and extremely tech oriented to help train you). WIlling to train the right person ready to "run through a wall" to learn a new skill and loves to learn as we build a career. We are looking for someone willing to work in the long term. 



Note that this role will be a placement, and you'll be officially working for our consultancy with our support, but directly reporting to this team.



**To Apply:**

Ready to take the next step? Please do the following! Send an
, subject line "Social Media Tech!" to 
 with:

1. Your resume and brief cover letter

2. Attach a short 2-4 minute loom video describing relevant experience and why you'd be a great fit for this position

3. Put in subject line the word "Excited For Tech!" to show you've read all directions from this ad





**Next Steps**

If accepted, you will receive a calendar link to schedule an interview directly with me, the consultant on this account.



If chosen, we will agree to a 2 week paid trial period to ensure it's a right fit for everyone. In the trial we are looking for someone who takes ownership to drive the role forward, asks great questions, is detail oriented, and is a great partner to work with long term!



These clients are well established and great people with a great culture. They just need someone willing to dig in and help them get out of their own way (a task we'll take on together!).



We're looking to interview and hire VERY quickly on this position, so don't wait - apply today!

title: Technical SEO & Domain Migration Lead
description:
(SaaS / Financial Services)

Location: Remote

Type: Contract (6–12 months, potential long-term)



Required Screening Questions

(Please answer all — incomplete responses will not be reviewed.)



1. Describe a domain migration you personally led.

2. How do you ensure link equity is preserved during a rebrand?

3. What are the 5 most common SEO mistakes that cause traffic loss during migration?

4. How would you monitor migration health during the first 30 days?

5. Explain how YMYL affects SEO strategy for financial services websites.

6. What tools would you use for this migration, and why?

7. 



All roles will collaborate during weekly migration sync meetings. Clear communication and documentation are required. Experience working in regulated or financial environments is strongly preferred.



My company is a business credit infrastructure platform and commercial data furnisher transitioning from a legacy brand into a SaaS-based financial services platform. We operate in a high-trust financial category and require a precise, risk-controlled SEO migration.



Role Overview



We are seeking a highly experienced Technical SEO specialist to lead our full domain migration and technical transition from our old website on Shopify to a new website customer built with Next.js



This role is responsible for protecting search equity, preserving organic rankings, and ensuring a seamless migration with minimal traffic loss.



This is not a junior SEO role. Migration experience is required.



Key Responsibilities

Pre-Migration



Full crawl and URL inventory of legacy domain



Backlink audit and link equity preservation strategy



Build detailed page-to-page 301 redirect map



Benchmark organic traffic and keyword rankings



Analyze anchor text profile



Prepare sitemap and robots.txt transition strategy



Migration Execution



Deploy 301 redirects (no blanket redirects)



Validate canonical tags and structured data



Configure Google Search Console property



Monitor crawl errors and indexation



Manage Core Web Vitals and performance issues



Post-Migration (First 60 Days)



Monitor ranking volatility



Identify and fix redirect chains



Repair broken internal links



Track index coverage and soft 404 errors



Weekly migration performance reporting



Required Experience



4+ years Technical SEO



Proven domain migration case studies



Experience in financial services, fintech, or SaaS



Strong knowledge of Google’s YMYL standards



Advanced proficiency with:



Google Analytics (GA4)



Google Search Console



Ahrefs or SEMrush



Screaming Frog



Success Metrics



Preserve 85–95% of legacy organic traffic



Maintain top-ranking URLs post-migration



Clean indexation with minimal errors



Stable domain authority transfer



Application Requirement



Submit a brief outline explaining how you would migrate a financial services website without losing link equity or traffic.



Final Question (Required)



Why do SEO migrations fail, and what differentiates a successful one?

title: DEVOPS / Infrastructure Engineer (Remote)
description:
Job Summary:

We are seeking an experienced Infrastructure Engineer with specialized knowledge in Adobe Commerce (formerly Magento) to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining scalable infrastructure solutions tailored to support Adobe Commerce environments. This role requires deep expertise in cloud technologies, infrastructure automation, and a strong understanding of Adobe Commerce architecture.





Duties and Responsibilities:

- Design, deploy, and maintain Adobe Commerce infrastructure on cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP).

- Implement infrastructure as code (IaC) using tools such as Terraform, CloudFormation, or Ansible to automate provisioning and configuration management.

- Optimize Adobe Commerce performance and ensure high availability through fault-tolerant design and continuous monitoring.

- Collaborate closely with development teams to understand application requirements and optimize infrastructure accordingly.

- Manage containerized applications using Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes.

- Implement and maintain CI/CD pipelines to automate software delivery and deployment processes.

- Ensure security best practices are followed throughout the infrastructure, including data encryption, access controls, and vulnerability management.

- Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues to ensure Adobe Commerce applications meet SLAs and performance targets.

- Conduct regular infrastructure audits and capacity planning to anticipate future needs and scale infrastructure accordingly.

- Document infrastructure configurations, procedures, and policies.



Prerequisite Skills and Qualifications:

- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field; or equivalent work experience.

- Proven experience as an Infrastructure Engineer or similar role with a focus on Adobe Commerce (Magento).

- In-depth knowledge of Adobe Commerce architecture, including cloud deployment models (Cloud, Commerce, B2B Commerce).

- Strong proficiency in cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.

- Hands-on experience with infrastructure automation tools like Terraform, CloudFormation, or Ansible.

- Familiarity with containerization technologies and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes).

- Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.

- Solid understanding of networking concepts and protocols (TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP/S).

- Ability to troubleshoot complex issues related to infrastructure, performance, and scalability.

- Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

- Certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect or similar are a plus.



Preferred Additional Skills:

- Experience with other eCommerce platforms and systems integration.

- Knowledge of relational and SQL databases commonly used with Adobe Commerce.

- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and project management tools.



Benefits:

- Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.

- Comprehensive health benefits package.

- Opportunities for professional development and certification reimbursement.

- Flexible work hours and remote work options.



Application Process:

Interested candidates should submit a resume and cover letter outlining their Adobe Commerce infrastructure experience, along with any relevant certifications. We look forward to reviewing your application and discussing how you can contribute to our team’s success.

- Implement and maintain CI/CD pipelines to automate software delivery and deployment processes.



- Ensure security best practices are followed throughout the infrastructure, including data encryption, access controls, and vulnerability management.



- Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues to ensure Adobe Commerce applications meet SLAs and performance targets.



- Conduct regular infrastructure audits and capacity planning to anticipate future needs and scale infrastructure accordingly.



- Document infrastructure configurations, procedures, and policies.







Prerequisite Skills and Qualifications:



- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field; or equivalent work experience.



- Proven experience as an Infrastructure Engineer or similar role with a focus on Adobe Commerce (Magento).



- In-depth knowledge of Adobe Commerce architecture, including cloud deployment models (Cloud, Commerce, B2B Commerce).



- Strong proficiency in cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.



- Hands-on experience with infrastructure automation tools like Terraform, CloudFormation, or Ansible.



- Familiarity with containerization technologies and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes).



- Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.



- Solid understanding of networking concepts and protocols (TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP/S).



- Ability to troubleshoot complex issues related to infrastructure, performance, and scalability.



- Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.



- Certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect or similar are a plus.







Preferred Additional Skills:



- Experience with other eCommerce platforms and systems integration.



- Knowledge of relational and SQL databases commonly used with Adobe Commerce.



- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and project management tools.







Benefits:



- Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.



- Comprehensive health benefits package.



- Opportunities for professional development and certification reimbursement.



- Flexible work hours and remote work options.







Application Process:



Interested candidates should submit a resume and cover letter outlining their Adobe Commerce infrastructure experience, along with any relevant certifications. We look forward to reviewing your application and discussing how you can contribute to our team’s success.

title: Ad & Creative Designer (Graphics + AI Performance)
description:
Join Our Team at 7 Figure Dojo!



We’re looking for a Graphic Designer with a performance mindset and strong AI fluency — someone who can produce scroll-stopping ad creatives at scale while leveraging AI tools to accelerate production, testing, and optimization.



This role is hands-on in ad creative production first, with a focus on conversion-driven performance design and AI-assisted workflow systems to ensure client campaigns not only look great but perform at a high level.



You should be comfortable combining design fundamentals, marketing psychology, performance data, and AI tools to increase creative velocity and improve CTR, CVR, and CPL.





Key Responsibilities:



I. Ad & Social Graphics (Primary)

* Design high-converting static and lightweight motion graphics for paid social (Meta, TikTok), display, and organic channels.

* Use AI tools (e.g., Midjourney, DALL·E, Firefly, Runway, Canva AI, ChatGPT, etc.) to:

- Generate concepts, visual variations, and creative hooks

- Accelerate asset production

- Enhance images and backgrounds

- Produce rapid creative testing variants

* Create multiple creative variations (hooks, headlines, layouts, colorways, formats) to support structured A/B testing.

* Adapt designs to multiple aspect ratios (1:1, 4:5, 9:16, 16:9) and platform specifications.

* Collaborate closely with Media Buyers to align creatives with offers, audiences, messaging angles, and KPI goals.

* Iterate rapidly based on performance data and testing insights.



II. AI-Driven Creative Systems

* Build repeatable AI-assisted creative workflows to increase output without sacrificing quality.

* Develop prompt systems and AI templates to generate scalable ad variations.

* Combine AI-generated assets with professional design refinement for polished, brand-aligned outputs.

* Use AI tools to speed up copy ideation and creative angle development (in collaboration with the marketing team).

* Stay current with emerging AI design tools and recommend improvements to internal workflows.



III. Brand & Visual Systems

* Apply or create lightweight brand kits (color systems, typography, layout frameworks) for consistent performance campaigns.

* Retouch, cut out, enhance, and AI-augment client photos with overlays, messaging frames, and ad-ready treatments.

* Prepare modular, editable ad templates for rapid iteration and scaling.

* Ensure AI-generated content remains brand-safe, compliant, and visually cohesive.



IV. Collaboration & Workflow

* Work from briefs, moodboards, and references — while proactively proposing AI-assisted, test-driven creative angles.

* Maintain organized design systems, prompt libraries, version control, and asset repositories.

* Collaborate cross-functionally with Media Buyers and Copywriters.

* Translate performance data into new creative hypotheses and creative refresh strategies.



V. Quality Control

* Proof for accuracy (copy, pricing, disclaimers, dates, logos).

* Ensure accessibility standards (contrast, readability, hierarchy).

* Confirm all exports meet platform requirements (dimensions, file size, format).

* Review AI-generated outputs for visual integrity and brand alignment.

* Revision Expectations

- Designs should require no more than 2 structured revision rounds when briefed correctly.

- Creative submissions must reflect thoughtful interpretation of the brief, performance intent, and brand standards.



VI. Continuous Improvement

* Stay ahead of trends in:

- Paid social creative

- Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) in ad creative

- AI-assisted design workflows

* Regularly review campaign data with Media Buyers and generate new test angles.

* Propose new AI tools or automation systems to improve output and performance.



VI. Performance Indicators

* Creative Velocity: Consistently meets or exceeds weekly creative production quotas.

* Performance Lift: Designs contribute to measurable improvements in CTR, CVR, CPL, and ROAS.

* Testing Discipline: Delivers multiple structured variations per brief and tracks results.

* AI Leverage: Demonstrates efficient use of AI tools to increase output and iteration speed.

* Brand Alignment: Campaign assets reflect brand guidelines with minimal rework.

* Operational Hygiene: Clean file organization, prompt libraries, naming conventions, and structured handoffs.





Portfolio Requirements (Mandatory)



To be considered for this role, applicants must submit a portfolio that clearly demonstrates performance-driven design experience.



Your portfolio must include:

* Paid social ad creatives (Meta, Instagram, TikTok, etc.).

* Examples of multiple creative variations for the same offer (hooks, formats, colorways, angles).

* Performance metrics when available (CTR, CPL, CVR, ROAS, etc.).

* Before/after examples or A/B test comparisons (if applicable).

* Landing pages or funnel designs (if available).





Qualifications

* 1-2 years of experience in graphic design for paid social (Meta/IG/TikTok preferred).

* Strong proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator, Canva, or Figma.

* Demonstrated experience using AI tools in creative production (Midjourney, Firefly, Runway, Canva AI, ChatGPT, etc.).

* Strong understanding of conversion-focused ad design principles and A/B testing.

* Ability to balance creative intuition with performance data.

* Comfortable working in a fast-paced, metrics-driven environment.





Salary

$1100 - $1600 per month based on experience



This is a performance-driven role with clear room for growth as output and campaign performance improve. Compensation is based on results and impact — not hours on the clock.

title: Marketing & Content Creator
description:
The Role:



This is a hybrid marketing + content creation role. You’ll manage our social media presence, plan and execute content strategy, AND create short-form video content (TikToks, Reels, Shorts) for our apps. You’re the full package — you can think strategically about what to post and when, but you can also open CapCut, record a voiceover, and make a video that actually performs. You’ll be working across multiple apps, so the work stays varied and interesting.



What You’ll Do



Content Creation (50%)

• Create 6–12 short-form videos per month across our app portfolio (TikTok, Reels, Shorts)

• Produce gameplay clips, screen recordings with voiceover, app walkthroughs, and trending format content

• Stay on top of TikTok/Reels trends, sounds, and hooks in the gaming and app space

• Adapt your content style for different apps — a game needs different energy than a utility app

• Deliver raw and edited video files for repurposing across platforms



Marketing & Social Media Management (40%)

• Manage and grow Degen Game Studios’ social media accounts (TikTok, Instagram, X/Twitter, YouTube)

• Build and maintain a content calendar across all apps and platforms

• Schedule and publish content using tools like Buffer, Later, or similar

• Monitor and respond to community engagement — comments, DMs, app reviews

• Research trending hashtags, sounds, and content formats relevant to our apps

• Identify influencer and cross-promotion opportunities



Analytics & Growth (10%)

• Track key metrics: downloads, engagement rates, follower growth, video performance

• Assist with App Store Optimization (ASO) for both App Store and Google Play — keyword research, screenshot ideas, description updates

• Help set up and monitor basic paid ad campaigns when needed (Apple Search Ads, Meta Ads)

• Provide a brief monthly summary of what’s working and what to try next



Requirements

• 1–2+ years of experience in social media marketing, content creation, or both

• Strong portfolio of short-form video content (TikTok, Reels, or Shorts) — share your work

• Comfortable with voiceover and screen recording (face on camera optional, voice required)

• Proficient with video editing tools (CapCut, Premiere, DaVinci, or similar)

• Understanding of what performs on TikTok and Reels — hooks, pacing, trending formats

• Experience with social media scheduling and analytics tools

• Strong written communication and ability to work independently

• Genuine interest in mobile gaming, apps, or tech content



Nice to Have

• Experience marketing mobile apps or games on iOS and Android

• Existing audience in the mobile gaming or app review niche

• Familiarity with ASO for both App Store and Google Play

• Experience with Apple Search Ads or Meta Ads Manager

• Basic graphic design skills (Canva, Figma, etc.)

• Experience managing multiple products or brands simultaneously



Why This Role

• Get in on the ground floor of a growing indie studio with multiple titles in the pipeline

• Creative freedom — you’ll shape the brand voice and content strategy from scratch

• Flexible, remote, part-time schedule that works around your life

• Opportunity to grow with the studio as we scale — more apps, bigger budgets, more responsibility

title: Staffing Coordinator (Home Health Agency)
description:
Job description:



Job Title: Staffing Representative - Home Health Therapy (Remote, Night Shift)



Location: Work from Home - (U.S. Pacific Standard Time)



About the Company

A List Therapy Group is a California-based provider of in-home physical, occupational, and speech therapy services. We partner with over 300 agencies and hospitals, delivering exceptional patient care through our large network of licensed therapists.



Position Overview

We are hiring a full-time Staffing Representative to work remotely. This role coordinates therapist assignments, manages incoming referrals, updates patient records, and ensures fast, accurate communication with both clinicians and U.S.-based partner agencies. You will also be responsible for problem-solving staffing challenges and maintaining strong professional relationships with our therapists.



Key Duties



• Review and respond to incoming patient referrals in real time.

• Assign therapists based on location, coverage area, and specialty.

• Enter and update patient data in CliniConnects and TherapySync.

• Follow up on pending cases and manage restaffing when needed.

• Send consent forms and required documents to therapists.

• Communicate promptly via WhatsApp, phone, and
.

• Maintain positive working relationships with therapists to encourage engagement and reliability.

• Identify and resolve staffing issues quickly to prevent delays in patient care.

• Maintain accurate records and update rate sheets as needed.



Qualifications



• Experience in home health staffing, healthcare scheduling, or medical coordination preferred.

• Strong English communication skills (written and spoken).

• Proven problem-solving abilities and conflict resolution skills.

• Ability to build and maintain professional relationships with therapists.

• Highly organized, able to multitask, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

• Proficiency with Google Workspace, WhatsApp, and data entry systems.

• Own computer, noise-cancelling headset, and stable internet connection.

• Comfortable using Hubstaff and 
 with a working camera.

• Willing to work night shift: Monday–Friday, 9:00 AM–6:00 PM PST (Philippines time: 12:00 AM–9:00 AM).



Why Join Us



• Competitive pay for remote work.

• Work directly with a U.S.-based healthcare company.

• Supportive, team-focused environment with growth opportunities.



How to Apply



• Please send a short cover letter highlighting your experience relevant to the role you are applying for, and include your answers to the questions below:

1. How many years of experience do you have working for a home health provider company?

2. How many years of experience do you have working as a staffing coordinator?

• Kindly monitor your OLJ inbox, as I will send the final interview link and your schedule there if you are shortlisted for the position.

title: Administrative Support Specialist
description:
Job Title: Administrative Support Specialist



Location: Remote



Job Type: Full-Time



Experience Level: Entry Level to Junior Level - Recent College Graduates May Apply



About Us:

VCS is dedicated to helping veterans navigate the VA claims process with ease and confidence. We are seeking a detail-oriented Administrative Support Specialist to join our growing team. This is an entry to junior level position in regards to work experience and who are looking to make a meaningful impact on US veterans’ lives.



Job Summary:

The Administrative Support Specialist provides direct clerical and administrative assistance to the Claims Coach in support of business operations. The specialist will handle a variety of tasks, including managing communication, organizing client documentation, and ensuring efficient workflow processes.



Key Responsibilities:



• Email & Communication Management:

Review, organize, and annotate the Claims Coach’s emails.

o Respond to low-level emails on behalf of the coach when necessary.



• Phone & Messaging Support:

o Review voicemail and text messages on the coach’s phone line.

o Respond when needed and relay important messages.



• Client Documentation & Organization:

o Organize client documents in the company’s data storage system.

o Ensure documents are properly labeled according to company naming conventions.

o Track submitted client documentation and follow up on missing items.



• File Management & Workflow Support:

o Create and maintain online folders in the company’s data storage system.

o Prepare documents for digital signatures using the company’s e-signature tool.



• Client Interaction & Support:

o Receive inbound client calls and perform outbound calls as required.

o Serve as a point of contact for clients assigned to the coach.

o Address client concerns promptly and escalate as needed.



• Operational Support:

o Utilize AI tools to develop documentation supporting business operations.

o Draft and send emails using company templates or customized responses.

o Identify and recommend improvements to company operations.



Qualifications:

• Strong customer service and/or sales experience.

• College graduate (any major considered).

• Ability to work remotely with minimal supervision.

• Strong problem-solving skills – ability to define problems, collect data, and draw valid conclusions.

• Ability to interpret and follow detailed instructions.

• Comfortable working under pressure in a fast-paced environment.

• Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and stay organized in a growing company.

• Strong attention to detail and a diligent work ethic.

• Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

• Ability to maintain confidentiality when handling sensitive client information.



Preferred Qualifications:

• Background in healthcare or medical fields.

• Experience in sales is a plus.

• Experience using CRM systems and Google Suite (Docs, Sheets, Drive, etc.).



What We Offer:

• Competitive salary and benefits package.

• Opportunity to make a meaningful impact on the lives of veterans.

• A supportive and collaborative work environment.

• Professional development opportunities.



Compensation and Benefits

• Starting Salary: $450 - $650 USD per month, commensurate with experience. NOTE the support specialist may also receive monthly payouts (coach bonus) from his/her assigned claims coaches. These monthly payouts when totaled can exceed the salary coming from the company.

• Bonuses: Eligible for monthly, quarterly, and annual bonuses based on personal and company performance. Will also be eligible for spot awards that can include monetary bonus, gift cards, extra time off, or non-monetary recognition.

• 13 Month Salary: prorated based off hiring date.

• Salary Increase: Opportunity for a salary increase after a 90-day probation period for exceptional performance and goal achievement.

• Work From Home: Opportunity to work from designated home office and given IT credit to help with setting up his/her workstation.

• Paid Time Off: 10 days of PTO plus an additional day off for each of the 11 US Federal Holidays.

• Professional Development: Possible opportunities for courses and training related to the role within the company.



How to Apply: Please reply here in Onlinejobs.ph and complete the VCS Administrative Support Specialist questionnaire located at: https://forms.gle/M56o8SbQwWUKEGvq6

title: Talent Recruitment Specialist (Bilingual)
description:
We are seeking for a Specialist, Talent Recruitment in the Property Care / Field Services industry.



We are looking for a high-energy recruiter who can quickly find, screen, and schedule field workers across multiple markets. In simple terms — your job is to make sure our branches are never short-staffed.



This is a high-volume recruiting role. You will actively search for technicians, crew members, and field supervisors — not wait for them to apply. If you enjoy sourcing candidates, moving fast, and treating recruiting like sales, this role is for you.



Bilingual English & Spanish is required.



What You’ll Really Be Doing:

Sourcing (Finding Candidates)

Generate 50+ new candidate leads per day using Indeed, LinkedIn, Craigslist,
 Groups, and other platforms.

Proactively message, call, or text candidates to spark interest.

Build a strong pipeline for every open role.

Screening (Qualifying Candidates)

Review resumes quickly.

Conduct phone or text screenings within 2 hours of application.

Confirm basic qualifications (Driver’s License, location, experience).

Only pass qualified candidates to hiring managers.



Interview Scheduling

Schedule interviews for Market Managers and Supervisors.

Send calendar invites and confirmations.

Follow up 24 hours before interviews to reduce no-shows.



Onboarding Support

Collect required documents (I-9, Direct Deposit, Licenses, etc.).

Ensure new hire paperwork is complete before Day 1.

Maintain organized digital employee files.



System & Database Management

Update and maintain the Applicant Tracking System (ATS).

Properly tag candidates (Hired, Rejected, Future Interest).

Keep recruiting data clean and accurate.



What Success Looks Like:

Field roles filled within 7 days.

Daily sourcing targets consistently achieved.

At least 20% of screened candidates move to interview stage.

80%+ interview show-up rate.

100% complete and compliant new hire paperwork.



What We’re Really Looking For:

5+ years of high-volume recruiting or staffing experience.

Experience recruiting for landscaping, janitorial, construction, HVAC, pest control, or similar field roles is a plus.

Strong “hunter” mindset — you actively search and pursue candidates.

Comfortable cold-calling and texting applicants.

Experience using ATS systems, job boards, and scheduling tools.

Highly organized — able to manage 20+ open roles at once.

Strong follow-up skills — you don’t let candidates disappear.

Fluent in English and Spanish (required).



Requirements:

Updated Resume/CV.

Reliable internet connection and personal computer.

Ability to work in a fast-paced, high-volume environment.

Able to work in U.S hours



Benefits:

Competitive salary based on experience.

PTO and paid holidays.

Remote work flexibility.

HMO for you and your dependents

Opportunity to grow in a performance-driven environment.



Join our team now and be part of the top 1% talent in the Philippines!

title: Hiring DTC Creative Strategist (Static Ad copywriter, Facebook campaigns, VSLs, and landing pages ) )
description:
About the Company



Allipse Marketing Management owns and operates multiple direct-to-consumer brands in the US market, primarily in health, beauty, and wellness. We build brands that solve real problems and scale through performance-driven marketing.



We’re now looking for a Direct Response Copywriter who knows how to write copy that converts — especially for static ads and paid traffic funnels.



About the Role



This role is for a copywriter who understands how ads actually work in performance marketing. You’ll be writing copy for static image ads,
 campaigns, VSLs, and landing pages — with a strong focus on messaging that stops the scroll and drives action.



You should understand how copy changes across cold, warm, and hot audiences, and how to brief designers so ideas translate clearly into high-performing creatives.



What You’ll Do



Write direct response copy for static image ads and paid social campaigns



Write ads across the full funnel (TOF, MOF, BOF) — from hooks to conversion-focused messaging



Develop hooks, headlines, primary text, and CTAs that drive clicks and sales



Create clear creative briefs so designers execute your ideas correctly



Apply concepts like awareness stages, customer avatars, and market sophistication



Use AI tools to speed up research, ideation, and variation testing



Review performance data and iterate on what’s working



What We’re Looking For



2+ years of experience writing direct response copy for DTC e-commerce



Strong understanding of hooks, objections, CTAs, and buyer psychology



Experience writing static ad copy, not just long-form content



Comfortable writing for US audiences



Confident using AI tools as part of your daily workflow



Agency or performance-marketing experience is a plus



Growth Path



Copywriter ? Senior Copywriter ? Lead Copywriter ? Creative Strategist



How to Apply



Please send:



Your resume / CV



3–5 samples of direct response copy (static ads, scripts, or landing pages)



A short note on one ad you think works well and why



Note: This role is not suitable for beginners.

title: E-commerce Finance - Long Term 0 Part Time
description:
What are we looking for



We are looking for a Finance Manager.

In this role, you are responsible for our financial health and planning. You manage cashflow, forecast future performance, and help us make smart investment decisions. You give clear insights about margins, profit, and growth possibilities.



What We Offer (USP’s):



• Hourly rate: $10–$15 (depending on experience)

• 10-15 hours per week

• performance bonus

• We offer a stable long-term position with growth opportunities.



Our Story (About Us):



We are a fast-growing e-commerce company, mainly active on 
 (the #1 online marketplace in the Netherlands and Belgium). With our international team of 12+ members, we build and grow our own brands. We value structure, teamwork, and long-term partnerships. Our focus is on delivering high-quality products while supporting our team with clear processes and growth opportunities.



Your Responsibilities:



• Manage and monitor company cashflow

• Create monthly and quarterly financial forecasts

• Analyze profit margins and overall financial performance

• Advise if and when external financing or loans are needed

• Calculate how much we can safely invest in stock, marketing, and growth

• Prepare clear financial reports for management



What We Expect (Requirements/Experience):



• Reliable PC & strong internet connection

• 3+ years experience in finance, accounting, or financial planning

• Strong Excel or Google Sheets skills (forecasting & financial modeling)

• Experience with cashflow management and budgeting

• Understanding of profit margins, ROI, and investment analysis

• Experience in e-commerce or online business 

Experience with advising E-commerce sellers to Take out loan to take opportunity and To lower loans for better balance sheet.

And also with projecting future sales and basing cashflow on this projection





How to Apply:



Please answer the following questions:



What is your hourly rate?

Describe your experience with cashflow forecasting and financial planning.

Have you advised before on investments or taking loans? If yes, explain briefly.

This is a performance-focused role. We value speed, creativity, and results.

title: Influencer & Social Media Marketing Specialist
description:
We run an e-commerce business in the herbal healing space, rooted in Traditional Chinese Medicine (a bonus if you're familiar). We are 100% Direct to Consumer (DTC) and largely a subscription-based business. 



Our Ambassador Program is a key growth channel, and we're looking for someone to lead outreach, management, and social engagement while providing community care through customer support.



Role Overview

This is a hybrid role focused primarily on ambassador management and social media engagement (70%) with customer experience support (30%). 

You'll report to the Head of Community Care and work closely with our CX Lead Agent and the broader CX team. 

You'll own the day-to-day ambassador relationships, social listening, content curation, and community engagement across Instagram and TikTok.



Primary Responsibilities: Ambassador Management & Social Media (70%)

Ambassador Outreach & Relationship Management

Source and recruit new ambassadors through proactive outreach on Instagram, TikTok, and other social platforms

Manage ambassador onboarding process and ongoing relationship nurturing

Process ambassador applications.

Track ambassador performance, content creation, and program engagement

Coordinate ambassador campaigns to drive additional conversions

Coordinate ambassador communications, including newsletter updates and program announcements

Request and organize raw b-roll content from ambassadors for internal content library

Monitor and report on ambassador-driven metrics and conversion performance



Social Media Engagement & Community Building

Reply to comments on our brand’s Instagram and TikTok accounts

Complete social engagement with ambassadors and niche creators in hormone health, TCM, period education, nervous system regulation, and holistic wellness across Instagram,
 groups, TikTok, Reddit

Leave thoughtful, specific comments on ambassador and relevant creator content (not generic engagement)

Build authentic relationships with emerging creators in our niche

Stay culturally relevant within the hormone health and TCM communities



Content Curation & Trend Research

Conduct weekly trending content research across TikTok and Instagram and identify trending videos/Reels weekly related to period symptoms, TCM, hormone healing, herbs, stress regulation, and related topics

Save content to organized collections and log links in tracking spreadsheet with analysis (hook, format, why it's trending)

Monitor daily social media tags, repost ambassador content to brand stories with branded backgrounds, and send personalized thank-you messages via DM

Download, organize, and archive all ambassador mentions, story tags, and weekly organic posts following established naming conventions and Drive folder structure



Secondary Responsibilities: Customer Experience (30%)

Respond to
, chat, or social media tickets from current and prospective customers, including:

Cancellation requests, website issues, shipping issues, order questions, product education

Follow Standard Operating Procedures when handling tickets

Escalate complex tickets to Lead Agent according to protocol

Process refunds, re-shipments, and other customer requests

Log product, fulfillment, and technology defects

Contribute customer insights during tea
etings





Additional Responsibilities

Support ad-hoc projects across Ops, Marketing, and Community Care teams

Maintain organized tracking systems for ambassador activities, social engagement, and customer interactions



The Ideal Candidate Will Have:

Required:

Exceptional English writing capabilities (understanding American terminology and expressions)

2+ years experience in influencer outreach, social media community management, or ambassador program coordination

Strong Instagram and TikTok native skills with ability to identify trends, spot emerging creators, and engage authentically

Highly organized with meticulous attention to detail

Experience with customer service handling
, chat, and SMS inbound tickets

Experience with Aspire, Shopify, Recharge, Gorgias, and Google Suite (especially Drive organization)

Comfort using AI tools (ChatGPT or other LLMs) to improve messaging and efficiency

Ability to work weekends (consistent schedule with start time between 8am-12pm EST, end time 5pm-9pm EST)

Self-starter mentality with ability to manage independent weekly tasks and proactively communicate status

Empathetic, warm communication style focused on building genuine relationships (not transactional engagement)

Eye for quality content and understanding of what makes posts replicable or scroll-stopping



Preferred:

Experience at an American DTC e-commerce startup in women's CPG, wellness, or healthcare

Prior experience managing or working with influencer/ambassador programs

Familiarity with Traditional Chinese Medicine, hormone health, or holistic wellness topics

Experience using content download tools and building organized content libraries

Experience with quiz platforms (Digioh, Pickzen, etc.)

Prior experience working with AI agents, escalating issues, and troubleshooting rules and knowledge bases

Personal interest in wellness, cycle health, or TCM



Next Steps

Please upload your resume and fill out this screening assessment: 
/to/vjnMl6uk to help us assess your interest in this role and how you handle various customer and ambassador scenarios. If it seems like a good fit, we'll reach out to schedule an interview. We'd love for someone to start by early March.

title: Billing & Collections Specialist
description:
We are seeking for a Specialist, Billing & Collections in the Property Care / Field Services industry.



We are looking for someone who will make sure the work completed by our field teams turns into accurate invoices — and that those invoices get paid on time.



In simple terms — your job is to send correct invoices quickly, follow up on unpaid accounts, and make sure money comes in without delays.



This is not just a data-entry role. You will own the billing process from start to finish.



What You’ll Really Be Doing:

Billing & Invoicing

Generate invoices for residential and commercial services (pest control, landscaping, janitorial, pool care, etc.).

Submit invoices through customer vendor portals (like VendorNet and others).

Ensure invoices are sent on time — many due on the 1st of the month or within 24 hours of job completion.

Double-check contract details (square footage, materials used, pricing) before sending invoices.



Vendor Portal Management

Upload required documents like W-9s and Certificates of Insurance (COIs).

Resolve invoice rejections quickly (within 24 hours).

Maintain compliance in customer portals to prevent payment delays.



Collections & Accounts Receivable

Monitor the AR Aging report daily.

Follow up on unpaid invoices via
 and phone.

Reduce overdue accounts and meet DSO targets.

Maintain professional but firm communication with customers.



Data Accuracy & Compliance

Keep customer billing data accurate and updated.

Work with Internal Ops to secure required documents for payment release.

Minimize billing errors and disputes.



Customer Support

Resolve billing questions and disputes quickly.

Act as the main contact for billing concerns while maintaining strong client relationships.



What Success Looks Like:

Invoices are sent on time — no delays.

95% of invoices are collected within payment terms.

AR over 60 days stays below 5%.

Billing disputes stay below 2%.

Vendor portal issues are resolved within 24 hours.



What We’re Really Looking For:

5+ years of experience in billing, accounts receivable, or revenue cycle management.

Experience in service-based industries (facility services, property services, etc.) is a plus.

Comfortable working with vendor portals and ERP systems.

Strong attention to detail and accuracy.

Confident following up on unpaid invoices — you are not afraid to pick up the phone.

Strong understanding of contracts, tax rates, and billing calculations.

Organized and able to manage multiple accounts at once.

Results-driven and motivated by hitting collection targets.



Requirements:

Updated Resume/CV.

Reliable internet connection and personal computer.

Ability to work in a deadline-driven environment.

Able to work in U.S hour



Benefits:

Competitive salary based on experience.

HMO for you and your dependents

PTO and paid holidays.

Remote work flexibility.

Opportunity to grow in a performance-focused accounting team.



Join our team now and be part of the top 1% talent in the Philippines!

title: HubSpot CRM & Marketing Automation Specialist
description:
We’re a fast-growing U.S.-based company looking for a highly experienced HubSpot Automation & Integrations Specialist who truly understands HubSpot at a deep, systems level.



This is NOT a training role.

This is a hands-on, high-level position for someone who can take ownership immediately and improve our systems from day one.



Our main focus:

You must have extensive knowledge of HubSpot and integrations.



If you do not confidently rate yourself at least 7.5/10 in HubSpot, you should still be the type of professional who is proactive, resourceful, and fully confident in your ability to research, test, and master anything needed to exceed expectations.



We are not looking for someone who has “used HubSpot.”

We are looking for someone who understands how it works under the hood.



If you can build, optimize, fix, and integrate HubSpot without hand-holding, we want 



What You’ll Be Responsible For

HubSpot Automation & CRM Management

• Build advanced custom HubSpot workflows for lead routing, onboarding, follow-ups, and marketing automation

• Audit, troubleshoot, and repair broken or inefficient workflows

• Optimize Marketing, Sales, and Operations Hub processes for scalability

• Manage and refine pipelines, deal stages, lifecycle stages, and automation rules

• Set up task automation, sequences, contact scoring, smart lists, and segmentation

• Improve data structure and ensure CRM integrity



Integrations & Systems Management (Major Focus)

• Integrate HubSpot with third-party tools such as: Zapier / Google Sheets / Calendly /
 platforms / Other CRMs / Marketing tools

• Troubleshoot sync issues, API-related challenges, automation failures, and data inconsistencies

• Create internal alerts, notifications, and operational automations

• Ensure clean, reliable data flow between systems

• Proactively recommend better system architecture when needed



Copy & Marketing Logic (Support Role)

• Support
 sequences and automation copy when required

• Understand funnel logic, lifecycle stages, and campaign strategy

• Ensure automation aligns with marketing and sales goals



Must-Have Requirements (Non-Negotiable)



• Extensive hands-on experience with HubSpot (Marketing, Sales, and/or Operations Hub)

• Minimum 2+ years managing complex workflows and CRM systems

• Strong experience with HubSpot integrations and third-party tool connections

• Proven ability to audit, fix, and optimize broken automations

• Deep understanding of:

Lead lifecycle management

Segmentation and list logic

Automation triggers and enrollment rules

Data structure and CRM best practices

• Highly proactive and solution-oriented

• Comfortable figuring things out independently without waiting for instructions

• Excellent English communication skills (written and spoken)



You should be confident enough in HubSpot that if something new is required, you know you can learn it quickly and execute at a high level.



Bonus Points If You

• Have supported U.S.-based companies

• Have strong experience with Zapier troubleshooting and CRM sync fixes

• Think in systems and processes (not just tasks)

• Proactively suggest improvements instead of waiting to be told what to do

• Have experience improving reporting accuracy and automation efficiency



Work Schedule & Setup



• Full-time: 40 hours per week

• 100% Work From Home

• Must have some overlap with U.S. Eastern Time business hours



Compensation & Growth



• Monthly Salary: USD $660 – $1,500 (Full-Time), depending on experience

• Competitive PHP-based compensation

• Performance-based bonuses

• Long-term role with room for growth and increased responsibility



Please DO NOT Apply If



• You need training on how HubSpot works

• You have only used HubSpot for basic
 marketing or contact management

• You are not comfortable troubleshooting integrations

• You wait for instructions instead of solving problems



How to Apply



To apply, please submit:



Your CV

Examples or screenshots of HubSpot workflows/automations you’ve built

A short 1–2 minute intro video explaining:

Your HubSpot experience

Your confidence level (rate yourself 1–10)

A workflow or integration you are most proud of

 Subject Line:

“HubSpot Automation Specialist – [Your Name]”



We are looking for someone who thinks like a systems architect, executes like an operator, and improves everything they touch.



If that’s you — apply now and show us what you can do.

title: Bilingual (Spanish/English) - Virtual Admin Assistant
description:
I’m looking for a highly organized and proactive bilingual Administrative Assistant (Spanish/English) to support high-volume scheduling, communication, and coordination across multiple offices. 



This is an execution-focused role that requires strong calendar management skills, confidence handling inbound and outbound calls, and the ability to keep day-to-day operations running smoothly while delivering a positive experience for both clients and employees.



What you’ll do:



- Manage and schedule client appointments to maintain full and optimized caseloads

- Answer, screen, and handle inbound and outbound calls professionally and efficiently

- Provide administrative coverage and scheduling support for multiple offices

- Coordinate with clinical staff, operations, and internal teams to ensure smooth service delivery

- Maintain accurate calendars and scheduling records using Google Calendar, Docs, and Sheets

- Use CentralReach and CRM systems to manage client data, appointments, and communication

- Apply ABA and Speech Therapy (ST) scheduling requirements, including session types and provider availability

- Proactively resolve scheduling conflicts, cancellations, and last-minute changes

- Ensure clear communication and reliable support for both clients and staff



What I’m looking for:



- Professional proficiency in both Spanish and English

- Experience as an Administrative Assistant, Scheduling Coordinator, or in a call center environment

- Strong understanding of ABA and Speech Therapy scheduling workflows

- Hands-on experience with CentralReach and CRM systems

- Proficiency in Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Calendars)

Schedule:

- Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM – 6:00 PM PST



Apply here:

title: Youtube Video Editor
description:
Vending Accelerator™ is not a vending machine brand.



We are the category creator of High-Traffic Location Mastery™ — a system that helps professionals build six-figure vending businesses using 2–3 high-traffic locations instead of 30+ machines



We are growing quickly.



We publish:

* 1 long-form YouTube video per week

* Multiple YouTube Shorts weekly

* Instagram +
 Reels

* We are looking for a high-speed, high-standard video editor who can help us scale without sacrificing quality.



This is not an influencer channel.



This is a category-defining brand built on:

* Proof

* Precision

* Authority

* Real client results

* Psychology-driven positioning



We do not use hype edits.



We do not use flashy gimmicks.



We do not overproduce.



Our style is:

* Clean

* Sharp

* Intentional

* Strategic

* Conversion-aware



If you specialize in loud thumbnails, 
 edits, or dopamine-heavy cuts — this is not the role.



If you understand pacing, tension, authority, and clarity — keep reading.



* Editing 1 long-form YouTube video per week (10–25 minutes)

* Turning that long-form into 5–10 Shorts

* Delivering vertical versions formatted for IG + FB

* Clean captioning (no clutter)

* Strategic pacing to improve retention

* Simple but strong hook emphasis in first 5–10 seconds

* Quick turnaround (24-48 hours preferred for long-form)



You must:

* Understand retention editing

* Know how to cut dead space without killing authority

* Add subtle motion, zooms, framing adjustments

* Keep energy high without being obnoxious

* Deliver on time, every time

* Be responsive and coachable

* Think strategically, not just technically

* Speed with accuracy

* Clean file organization

* Ownership mentality

* Long-term partnership mindset

* Ability to take feedback without ego

* Experience editing education or business content

* Understanding of YouTube analytics

* Thumbnail collaboration ability

* Ability to suggest hook improvements



Ryan is the founder of Vending Accelerator™ and FREE Healthy Vending™ — a dual ecosystem serving 250,000+ students and tens of thousands of consumers nationwide.



His clients have generated over $20M+ in revenue across 2024–2025.



We are not experimenting.



We are scaling a proven system.



Send:

* Portfolio (long-form + shorts)

* 2 examples of business/education content

* Your turnaround time for: 15-minute YouTube video & 5 shorts from that video

* Your availability

* Your rate structure



We are hiring quickly.

title: Medical Care Coordinator
description:
Job Type: Full-Time | Long-Term | Permanent Position (9:00 AM – 6:00 PM PST)

About Us

A List Therapy Group partners with home health agencies across the U.S. to deliver high-quality therapy services and virtual support. We are looking for a proactive and detail-oriented Care coordinator to join our remote team. This role is crucial to ensuring patient care coordination, maintaining agency relationships, and keeping operations running smoothly.



Key Responsibilities

• Manage and monitor a caseload of
patients, ensuring continuity of care and timely completion of visits.

• Follow up with therapists daily to confirm they meet prescribed visit frequencies and complete documentation/notes on time.

• Address all
s and respond to all phone calls within 30 minutes during the shift.

• Build and maintain strong relationships with home health agencies to ensure patient referrals and caseload growth.

• Track patient schedules, visit frequencies, and outstanding tasks.

• Identify and resolve problems quickly, ensuring issues are escalated and resolved in a timely manner.

• Multitask effectively while balancing communication, documentation, and coordination responsibilities.



Requirements

• Prior experience in healthcare coordination, or case management (home health experience preferred but not required).

• Excellent English communication skills (written and verbal).

• Exceptional problem-solving, follow-up, and multitasking abilities.

• Stable high-speed internet connection and reliable power source.

• Must have a computer, noise-cancelling headset, and functional camera.

• Must use Webwork time tracker throughout shift.

• Must remain active on 
 with camera on for the full shift.

• Ability to work 9:00 AM – 6:00 PM PST (night shift in the Philippines).



Why Join Us

• Fully remote, work-from-home position.

• Stable, long-term career opportunity with growth potential.

• Supportive team and professional company culture.

• Ongoing training and development opportunities.



How to Apply



• Please send a brief cover letter outlining your experience that is aligned or related to the role you are applying for. Make sure to include the specific tasks you have handled, as well as the link to your resume.

• Kindly monitor your OLJ inbox, as I will send the final interview link and your schedule there if you are shortlisted for the position.

title: Social Media Video Editor
description:
The Vibe:

We are KasoLead a. premium B2B marketing agency that has served 120+ clients across Scandinavia and the US. 



Our content doesn't look like a corporate agency. It looks like it belongs on your feed, stops the scroll, and closes deals.

We make ads that convert.



YouTube videos that build authority, and organic content that actually gets watched.



The Role:

We're looking for a Master Editor. Someone who treats the timeline like a weapon. You don't just cut clips together. You understand why a cut lands, when a 
 makes someone trust a brand more, and how pacing can make someone feel something before they even realize it.



What You'll Do:

Edit Video ads, organic short-form content, and long-form YouTube videos, sometimes all three in the same week.



You'll know when something should feel premium and polished, and when it should feel raw and punchy like a 
 that belongs on the internet. You'll use AI tools (Runway, Veo, whatever works) to generate B-roll when you need to go the extra mile, not as a shortcut, but as a craft tool. You'll bring persuasion into every edit, knowing that emotion drives action.



You Are:

Someone who eats, sleeps, and breathes editing. You understand virality and you understand conversion, and you know they're not opposites. You have a sharp aesthetic eye. 



You can switch between "this needs to feel like a $50k ad campaign" and "this needs to feel like a funny video a friend sent you" without missing a beat. You're resourceful. If you can't find the right clip, you make it. You're committed. You don't disappear, you deliver.



Requirements:

Proficient in whatever editing software you have. Strong portfolio showing both short-form and long-form work. 



Can edit videos in the Swedish or Norwegian language besides English, with a proper script or by pasting down the script from software like WisperFlow to see the captions.



How to Apply:

Send your portfolio to 
 or message.



Highlight 1–2 videos where you felt the editing itself carried the emotion or the story, not just the script.



THE TEST: We send you a dry talking-head clip. No music. No B-roll. Nothing. How do you make it really really good and worth watching? Tell us your approach in 3–5 sentences.



Start your message with "KASO EDITOR" so we know you actually read this.

title: Accountant & Bookkeeper
description:
From Day One’s Accountant/Bookkeeper will be responsible for managing and processing financial transactions of our conference and media company as well as assisting with general financial, data, operational, and analytical projects.



You will be use QuickBooks to classify transactions, and will create and maintain internal and managerial reports on business aspects of our operations. You’ll also work closely with our finance team, staff members, vendors, and clients to ensure accurate financial records and compliance with accounting standards.



In addition, this role will involve support for a broad set of operational and transactional processes within the company, including compliance, management, human resources, and other reporting and tracking processes.



This position requires a high degree of self-motivation, strong project management and organizational skills, facility with QuickBooks and Microsoft XL, and a willingness to master the other software platforms we use. You should be able to shift efficiently between disparate tasks and to work under pressure. You should also have excellent remote-work skills, interpersonal skills, and written and verbal communication skills.



REQUIREMENTS



• Must be available for a video interview, consisting of verbal questions and a skills test

• Must own a working laptop of a recent model and have full access to wifi of sufficient speed

• Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance or related field

• Minimum 3 years’ experience as a bookkeeper or similar role

• Proficiency in accounting software, especially QuickBooks Online

• Strong understanding of accounting principles and practices

• Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills

• Ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced remote environment

• Effective communication and interpersonal skills



SCHEDULE AND COMPENSATION



• The position is virtual. We are headquartered in Brooklyn, New York, and our main team works 9am-5pm Eastern Standard Time. Your schedule will require some overlap with U.S. hours.

• Estimated working hours: 40 hours per week

• This position will start with a weekly project. Upon successful completion of that initial assignment, you’ll transition to a monthly salary ($1000/month, plus an annual bonus).



RESPONSIBILITIES:



1. Accounts Payable

• Process invoices and ensure timely payments to vendors and suppliers

• Verify expenses, reconcile accounts, and resolve any discrepancies

• Maintain vendor files and communicate effectively with vendors regarding payment inquiries



2. Accounts Receivable

• Process invoices and ensure timely payments to vendors and suppliers

• Verify expenses, reconcile accounts, and resolve any discrepancies

• Maintain vendor files and communicate effectively with vendors regarding payment inquiries



3. Bank Reconciliation

• Process invoices and ensure timely payments to vendors and suppliers

• Verify expenses, reconcile accounts, and resolve any discrepancies

• Maintain vendor files and communicate effectively with vendors regarding payment inquiries



4. Financial Reporting

• Process invoices and ensure timely payments to vendors and suppliers

• Verify expenses, reconcile accounts, and resolve any discrepancies

• Maintain vendor files and communicate effectively with vendors regarding payment inquiries



5. Payroll Processing

• Process payroll for employees, including salary and bonuses

• Ensure compliance with payroll taxes, deductions, and reporting requirements

• Maintain accurate payroll records and provide support for any payroll-related inquiries

mbers across office, shop, and field operations, we are expanding into retail and opening our first showroom.

, or similar tools)

title: Healthcare Recruiter
description:
Job description:



We are a growing U.S.-based healthcare company seeking a Recruiter / Interview Specialist to support therapist hiring across multiple departments.



This role is call-heavy and interview-focused, with additional responsibility for coordinating hiring needs and tracking recruitment progress. Approximately 90% of your work will involve phone interviews with therapist candidates.



If you are not comfortable being on calls for most of your shift, this role is not a good fit.



Role Overview



• You will conduct daily phone interviews with licensed therapists (PT, OT, ST, PTA, COTA), coordinate with internal teams on hiring needs, and manage the recruitment pipeline from job posting through candidate handoff.

• You are the first point of contact for candidates and a key link between departments, so professionalism, organization, and communication are essential.



Key Responsibilities



• Interviewing & Screening (Primary Focus)

• Conduct high-volume phone interviews daily with therapist candidates.

• Screen candidates for: Licensure and credentials, Experience and specialties, Availability and geographic coverage,



Communication skills and professionalism

• Clearly explain roles, expectations, and next steps.

• Identify red flags and escalate concerns when necessary.

• Recruitment Coordination & Follow-Ups

• Follow up with candidates after interviews as needed.

• Coordinate with internal departments (staffing, operations, leadership) to understand current and upcoming hiring needs.

• Schedule next steps and hand off qualified candidates appropriately.

• Maintain timely and professional communication with candidates throughout the process.

• Job Posting & Process Tracking

• Post job openings on approved platforms as hiring needs change.

• Track candidates through each stage of the recruitment process.

• Keep recruitment trackers or ATS accurate and up to date.

• Provide basic updates on hiring progress when requested.



What We’re Looking For



• Comfortable being on the phone most of the workday.

• Clear, confident, professional speaking voice.

• Strong listening and judgment skills.

• Highly organized and detail-oriented.

• Able to manage follow-ups and coordination without losing 
ntum.



Qualifications



• 1–2+ years of experience in: Recruiting, Healthcare staffing, HR screening, Call center interviewing

• Excellent spoken and written English.

• Comfortable conducting multiple interviews per day.

• Familiar with Google Workspace (Sheets, Docs).

• Bonus: Experience recruiting healthcare professionals or independent contractors.



Requirements



• Reliable internet connection.

• Quiet, professional work environment for calls.

• Ability to work U.S. (PST) business hours.

• Part-time or full-time availability (to be discussed).



How to apply



• Please send a brief cover letter outlining your experience that is aligned or related to the role you are applying for. Make sure to include the specific tasks you have handled, as well as the link to your resume.

• Kindly monitor your OLJ inbox, as I will send the final interview link and your schedule there if you are shortlisted for the position.



Job Type: Part-time



Benefits:



• Paid training

• Work from home



Experience:



• Recruiting: 2 years (Required)

• Healthcare Staffing: 1 year (Required)

• Work Location: Remote

description:

We’re seeking a talented digital visual artist/video creator to produce 2 high-quality, social media-ready videos per month showcasing our client's products and machines. Using provided image renders, you’ll create realistic 3D product visuals, incorporate text captions, and generate voiceovers using AI tools like Kling or Higgsfield to make content polished and engaging.

- Deliver 2 fully produced, social media-optimized videos per month.



Requirements:

- Experience in 3D visualization, motion graphics, or product animation.

- Familiarity or openness to using AI tools for voiceover and captioning.

title: Creative Designer (AI tools Image ads & Video Ads) Dropshipping

We are looking for a Creative Designer who is skilled in working with AI image and video tools to create high-converting ad creatives for dropshipping products.



The role focuses on turning products from our store into image ads and video ads using AI tools (such as Nana Banana Pro and similar platforms), across different styles and prompts.



What you’ll be doing:



Creating AI-generated image ads for dropshipping products using AI tools



Creating AI video ads (short-form ad creatives) using AI video platforms



Translating product features into strong ad visuals for Meta / TikTok / paid ads



Working with different prompts and creative angles per product



Improving and iterating creatives based on examples and feedback



What we’re looking for:



Strong experience with AI image generation tools (e.g. Nana Banana Pro or similar)



Experience with AI video tools for ad creation



Someone who is hands-on, creative, and understands how to work with prompts



Able to come up with the right inputs/prompts independently, not just copy instructions



Experience with dropshipping products and ad creatives is a big plus



How we work:



We will provide examples and references for both image and video ads



You’re expected to use these as inspiration and create your own optimized versions



This is an ongoing collaboration if the quality and workflow match



Ideal candidate:



Creative mindset + technical understanding of AI tools



Understands what works in paid ads, not just “nice images”



Reliable, fast, and detail-oriented



If this sounds like you, please apply with:



Examples of AI image ads and/or AI video ads you’ve created



A short explanation of which AI tools you use
