title: PROCUREMENT & ADMIN COORDINATOR
description:
PROCUREMENT & ADMIN COORDINATOR

Full-Time | Remote | Residential Design + Build Company

Moonstone Design + Build is seeking a highly organized, detail-oriented Procurement & Admin Coordinator to support construction operations and pre-construction documentation.

This role is operational, structured, and systems-driven. It is not a creative design position.



ROLE PURPOSE

To manage material procurement, vendor coordination, documentation, and proposal drafting support so leadership can focus on vision, client experience, and high-level decision-making.

This role protects timelines and improves internal organization across all active projects.



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES

Procurement & Material Tracking

Enter and maintain product selections in Materio

Confirm pricing and lead times before ordering

Place orders and upload confirmations/invoices

Track delivery dates and update status regularly

Follow up weekly with vendors

Flag potential delays immediately in Slack

Propose alternatives for backordered items

Coordinate delivery timing with Build Operations & Site Supervisor

Track damaged goods, replacements, and returns



Proposal & Estimate Drafting Support

Draft structured proposals based on founder briefs 

Add logical missing scope items

Format proposals clearly and professionally

Help improve and standardize proposal templates

Draft change orders and compile pricing backup

Final pricing strategy and approval remain with leadership.



Administrative & Documentation Support

Maintain organized project folders

Upload procurement and estimate documents properly

Maintain vendor and subcontractor contact database

Track invoices related to materials

Support internal reporting sheets



WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE

Materials arrive on time and are fully tracked

No subcontractor is delayed due to procurement gaps

Proposals are structured, complete, and professional

Founder reviews and edits proposals — not builds them

Documentation is clean and accessible





IDEAL CANDIDATE

Experience in residential construction, estimating, or construction administration

Strong written English

Highly detail-oriented

Comfortable drafting formal documents

Proactive communicator

Able to manage multiple projects simultaneously

title: Chiropractic Medical Scribe (Full-Time | Remote) | RxWellness Spine & Health – Growing U.S. Healthcare Practices
description:
About Us



RxWellness Spine & Health is a fast-growing, multidisciplinary healthcare practice based in the United States. We are dedicated to delivering exceptional patient care through chiropractic, rehabilitation, and medical services.



We are looking for a reliable, detail-oriented Medical Scribe who wants to grow in the healthcare field and gain real clinical documentation experience.



This is an excellent opportunity for a young professional pursuing a long-term career in healthcare.



???? What Your Day-to-Day Will Look Like



As our Medical Scribe, you will:



Accurately scribe follow-up notes in our Electronic Health Record (EHR) system including:



Subjective

Objective

Assessment

Treatment Plan

Record and document Personal Injury (PI) progress reports and final reports, including:

Initial exams

X-rays

Full SOAP documentation

Chart Personal Injury cases meticulously to ensure documentation holds up legally (attorney and court standards)

Complete all notes within 48 hours of patient visits to meet insurance submission requirements

Maintain strict HIPAA compliance and patient confidentiality at all times



? What We’re Looking For



Excellent typing speed and strong computer proficiency

High attention to detail (this is critical)

Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment

Professional, reliable, and dependable

Committed to patient privacy and confidentiality

Basic medical terminology knowledge (a plus, not required)

Growth mindset and willingness to learn

Ideal for early-career healthcare professionals

If you love working on computers, enjoy precision-based work, and thrive in structured systems — this role could be for you.



???? Why Join RxWellness?



Direct exposure to real clinical documentation

Work alongside experienced healthcare practitioners

Supportive and collaborative team environment

Consistent full-time schedule

Long-term growth opportunity within a growing healthcare organization



???? Position Details



Job Type: Full-Time



Schedule: U.S. business hours



Training Provided: Yes (EHR training included)



Long-Term Role: Yes



???? How to Apply (Important)



To be considered, please:



Include the word “Precision” in the first sentence of your application.

Share your typing speed (WPM).

Briefly explain why you would be a strong fit for a medical documentation role.

Attach your resume.

Reply whether you would be open to a trial task or not.



Applications that do not follow instructions will not be reviewed.



If you are motivated, eager to learn, and passionate about helping patients achieve better health — we would love to hear from you.



Apply today and grow with RxWellness Spine & Health.

title: Contact Database Management Assistant
description:
Role Overview

This role supports our leadership, operations, and marketing teams by owning the behind-the-scenes systems that keep our training, community, and client experience running smoothly. Your work ensures our CRM and automations stay healthy, the contact info we have across all our databases is accurate and categorized correctly, and our leaders stay visible and engaged with our audience across multiple platforms.



Core Responsibilities

1. CRM Management

-Format and import incoming agent databases to merge accurately into our overall contact system

-Isolate and export offboarded agent databases and accurately re-route existing leads

-Sync contacts between CRM and marketing systems

-Maintain overall database health



2. Event & Campaign Support (HighLevel)

-Set up event-related automations (registration, reminders, follow-ups)

-Ensure all event components (forms, calendars, reminders) are functioning correctly

-Maintain updated lists and provide internal communication as needed



3. Training Department Support

-Accomplish general admin tasks to support the many training programs we run, including keeping rosters accurate, maintaining Calendly calendars for scheduling etc., and helping with onboarding tasks

-Own ensuring our recorded calls get uploaded to Google Drive and transcribed, then sending summaries to appropriate parties



Tools You’ll Use Daily

Asana

Google Sheets

Follow-Up Boss

HighLevel (GHL)

Slack

Social Platforms

Google Workspace





Ideal Candidate Skills

-Obsession with data accuracy (we need to trust that the person who manages all this client contact info formats it faithfully, accurately merges and imports / exports, and proactively reports issues)

-Strong attention to detail and ability to follow existing systems and workflows

-Confident working inside CRMs and spreadsheets

-Tech-comfortable and quick to learn new software platforms

-Highly organized, with the ability to manage recurring daily/weekly tasks reliably

-Proactive, dependable, and responsive—especially in remote/asynchronous environments

title: Senior Marketing Officer
description:
Role Summary: Marketing Generalist & Growth Partner



The client is looking for a high-level, proactive Marketing VA who will act as a growth partner, not just a content assistant.



This VA will turn the Founder’s expertise into authority, visibility, and revenue through strategic content, outreach, and marketing systems.



???? Core Expectations



1?? Extract & Produce Content



* Lead weekly sessions with the Founder to pull insights

* Turn conversations into LinkedIn posts, newsletters, short-form videos, and graphics

* Maintain a strict publishing schedule

* Ensure consistent voice and positioning

* Use AI tools efficiently to scale content production



???? The VA drives the content engine. The Founder provides expertise.



2?? Build Authority & Visibility



* Relaunch and manage a weekly authority newsletter

* Revive dormant social channels

* Engage with followers to build credibility

* Track performance and optimize messaging



3??Secure Growth Opportunities



* Research and pitch podcasts, conferences, and collaborations

* Personalize outreach (not generic templates)

* Track follow-ups and secure bookings

* Coordinate speaking engagements



???? The VA acts like a talent agent and brand builder.



4?? Manage Marketing Operations



* Maintain lead magnets and funnels

* Manage
 sequences and automation

* Ensure smooth flow from social follower ? booked call

* Track KPIs (views, clicks, bookings, open rates)



???? Ideal VA Profile



The client wants someone who is:



*Fluent, near-native in English

* Assertive and confident managing deadlines

* Strong in AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Descript, etc.)

* Systems-oriented and strategic

* Skilled in outreach and relationship building

* Comfortable representing a U.S.-based Founder

* Proactive — not waiting for instructions



???? What This Is NOT



* Not a junior social media VA

* Not just a designer

* Not someone who waits for tasks

* Not purely execution — this is strategic partnership



???? 90-Day Success Looks Like:



* Consistent LinkedIn & Instagram posting

* Relaunched weekly newsletter

* Active podcast outreach with booked interviews

* Organized workflows and content systems in place



Bottom Line



The client wants a **strategic, AI-savvy marketing growth partner** who can:



* Extract expertise

* Build authority

* Expand reach

* Manage marketing systems

* Drive real business growth



This is a high-responsibility, high-impact role, not a support-level position.

title: Remote Real Estate Sales Analyst (Full-Time | Benefits Included)
description:
Work From Anywhere | Join a Fast-Growing Real Estate Investment Firm



We’re looking for a detail-oriented Real Estate Sales Analyst to support our sales and acquisitions teams by running comps, analyzing property values, and delivering accurate market insights.



About the Role

Position: Real Estate Sales Analyst

Location: Anywhere – 100% Remote

Work Hours: Monday–Friday, 8:00 AM–5:00 PM Pacific Time

(Occasional weekend work up to 4 hours)

Work Duration: 40 hours/week



In this role, you’ll focus on running comparable sales on MLS, Redfin, Zillow, evaluating property values, talking to agents to get info. and supporting deal analysis to help drive informed investment decisions.



---------------------------------------

Qualifications

-Minimum 6 months of experience in real estate, sales analysis, or a similar support role (REQUIRED)

-Strong understanding of real estate fundamentals, including property valuation and market comps

-Ability to accurately run comps and assess values using Zillow, Redfin, MLS, or similar tools

-Connect with real estate agents to get property sales info

-Experience supporting sales or acquisitions teams with analysis and due diligence

-High attention to detail with strong analytical and critical-thinking skills

-Comfortable working with large datasets and summarizing insights clearly

-Strong written and verbal communication skills

-Proactive, resourceful, and able to work independently with minimal supervision



---------------------------------------

Technical Requirements

-Stable, high-speed internet connection

-Reliable laptop or desktop computer and smartphone

-Proficiency in Excel or Google Sheets (basic formulas, pivot tables, formatting)

-Experience with real estate platforms (Zillow, PropStream, Redfin, or similar)

-Comfortable using tools like Slack, Zoom, and Google Workspace



---------------------------------------

Compensation

-$5-$7/hour (based on experience)

-13th Month Pay

-Bi-weekly Pay



Benefits Package (Applicable once the employee is regularized after the probationary period)

-10 days of paid time off (PTO)

-Maxicare health insurance coverage

-Sales bonus for every real estate property successfully sold

-SV anniversary gifts

-Birthday gift

-13th Month Pay, with the potential to earn two to three times the standard amount, depending on individual performance and overall company results



---------------------------------------

How to Apply - Please submit:

     1. Resume (PDF or Word)

     2. Internet speed test screenshot

     3. Computer specs

     4. Short video (Loom or YouTube) introducing yourself explaining your experience running comps and supporting real estate analysis





Ready to grow with us?

Apply now and join SV Ventures — where data-driven insights power smart decisions.

title: Remote Inside Sales Agent (Full-Time, PST Hours)
description:
**Work From Anywhere | Join a Fast-Growing Real Estate Investment Firm**



Are you a persuasive communicator who thrives in inside sales? Do you enjoy qualifying leads, setting high-quality appointments, and driving deals forward through consistent follow-up?



If you’re looking for a long-term remote career with a company that values growth, accountability, and integrity — this opportunity is for you.



About the Role

Position: Inside Sales Agent (ISA)

Location: Anywhere – 100% Remote

Schedule: Monday–Friday, 8:00 AM–5:00 PM Pacific Time

(Occasional weekend work up to 4 hours)

Work Hours: 40 hours/week



As an Inside Sales Agent, you’ll be the frontline sales professional responsible for handling inbound and outbound leads, qualifying motivated sellers, and setting appointments for our acquisitions team. You’ll play a critical role in driving revenue by ensuring only high-quality opportunities move forward.



You’ll work closely with a supportive, performance-driven team that values consistency, ownership, and continuous improvement.



Qualifications & Requirements 

* Minimum 6 months of experience as an Inside Sales Agent (REQUIRED)

* Experience handling high-volume inbound and outbound calls

* Background in real estate, wholesaling, acquisitions, or property sales is a strong plus

* Proven ability to qualify leads, uncover motivation, and handle objections

* Confident, professional, and persuasive phone presence

* Excellent English communication skills (clear, neutral accent preferred)

* Strong follow-up skills and ability to nurture leads over time

* Comfortable working with CRM systems, dialers, and lead management tools

* Highly organized, detail-oriented, and consistent with data entry and notes

* Self-motivated, reliable, and able to hit daily/weekly call and appointment targets

* Team-oriented mindset with a strong sense of accountability

* Positive attitude and genuine interest in building rapport and long-term relationships





Technical Requirements

* Reliable high-speed internet (minimum 50 Mbps) with backup connection

* Reliable laptop/desktop and smartphone

* Quiet, distraction-free workspace suitable for sales calls





About SV Ventures

SV Ventures is a California-based real estate investment firm specializing in residential fix-and-flip projects and new construction throughout the Bay Area. We manage the full lifecycle — acquisitions, design, renovations, and financing — and we’re growing rapidly.



Our culture is built on strong core values:

-Growth Mindset – We learn, adapt, and improve continuously

-Accountability – We take ownership and deliver results

-Relationships – We build trust through every interaction

-Transparency – We value honesty, integrity, and clear communication



If these values resonate with you, you’ll feel right at home here.



Compensation & Benefits

-Hourly Rate: $6–8/hour (based on experience)

-3th Month Pay Bonus (with the opportunity to earn beyond for exceptional performance)

-Property Sale Bonus: $50 per property sold (Average: 12–20 properties per year)

-Bi-weekly Pay

-Long-term, stable remote position with growth opportunities





How to Apply

Please submit the following:



1. Resume (PDF or Word format)

2. Screenshot of Internet Speed Test

3. Computer Specs (make, model, RAM, storage, year of manufacture)

4. 3-minute video (Loom or YouTube only) answering:

      -Tell us about yourself — your experience, education, and why you’re a strong fit for an Inside Sales Agent role

      -What do you believe are the most important qualities of a successful Inside Sales Agent?





Ready to grow with us?

Apply now and become part of a team that values your success as much as its own.



Join SV Ventures — where growth, accountability, and opportunity meet.

title: Motion Graphics Video Editor

Details

title: Real Estate Operations & Systems Manager (Part-Time | Long-Term Growth)
description:
About Me



I am a listing-focused real estate agent building a disciplined, neighborhood-dominant system designed to grow to 50+ listings annually over the next few years.



This is not a chaotic sales environment.

This is structured, intentional, long-term building.



I am looking for a right-hand Operations & Systems Manager who can help build and maintain the backend structure of the business.



This is a foundational role.



?



What You’ll Help Build (First 90 Days)



Priority order:



1?? Database build & neighborhood farming systems

2?? CRM discipline & seller pipeline tracking

3?? Marketing preparation & ad support



You will help:



• Build and manage Trello boards for neighborhood farming

• Organize and track homeowner database

• Maintain CRM (Cloze) discipline

• Manage RealScout campaigns

• Assist with Meta Ads and Google LSA tracking

• Prepare Canva marketing templates

• Track weekly seller KPIs

• Refine repeatable systems



You will propose improvements.

Final execution is approved by me.



?



Platforms We Use



• Trello

• Canva

• RealScout

• Cloze CRM (or similar CRM experience)

• Cloud CMA

• Meta Ads Manager

• Google Workspace

• Google LSA



Experience with real estate systems is strongly preferred.



?



What I’m Looking For



• Systems thinker

• Organized and detail-oriented

• Calm under pressure

• Comfortable working async

• Strong written English

• Able to suggest improvements respectfully

• Interested in long-term growth



This is not a task-only role.

This is a system-building role.



?



Hours



• 15 hours per week

• Flexible schedule (async preferred)

• Some EST overlap occasionally

• 90-day review for performance & compensation



Long-term growth opportunity available.



?



About Working With Me



One of my current tea
mbers shared this about working together:



“I’ve never had a boss like Christy. She doesn’t measure work by hours, but by quality, intention, and thought. That creates an environment where you feel trusted and motivated to do your best work.



It’s the first remote role I’ve had that felt truly steady and non-toxic. There’s clarity, high standards, and room to take ownership. That kind of leadership brings out a depth of work I haven’t experienced in other roles.”



I believe in building systems intentionally and treating people with respect.



?



Growth Potential



As systems are refined, there may be opportunity to expand into additional real estate markets.



This is a long-term role for the right person.



?



To Apply



Please include:



1?? Your experience with Trello (describe how you’ve used it)

2?? Your experience with CRM systems

3?? Your experience with Meta Ads

4?? A short paragraph explaining how you would structure a 90-day neighborhood farming campaign

5?? The word “ANCHOR” at the top of your application



Applicants who do not follow instructions will not be considered.

title: Customer Service Agent / Customer Support VA
description:
Hi there!



We’re Samako, a fast-growing e-commerce brand from The Netherlands. With over 100,000 happy customers and strong traction on Bol, Amazon, and our own webshop, we’re building a new standard in the cleaning space. Our customers love us for our clever products and exceptional service — and we’re now looking for a full-time Customer Service Assistant (40 hours per week) to help us take that to the next level.



You’ll be working directly with our Dutch customer service lead and play a vital role in making sure our customers get the quick, helpful, and friendly support they deserve.



What’s in Store for You?



This is a remote, full-time role with a shift-based setup. Coverage during Dutch office hours (9:00–17:00 CET) is essential, and availability during weekends is a must.



We value quality over volume. We’d rather you take a bit longer and give an excellent answer than rush through tickets. You’ll be representing our brand, so tone, care, and clarity are key.



Who Are We Looking For?



We’re looking for someone who is friendly, sharp, and takes pride in great communication. Ideally, you:



- Have experience with customer service (e-commerce is a plus)

- Write and speak excellent English, clearly and professionally

- Are available for full-time work (40 hours/week) and can work Dutch office hours as well as evenings and weekends

- Communicate empathetically, calmly, and professionally, even when a customer is upset

- Are proactive and like solving problems on your own

- Are comfortable using tools like Gorgias, Bol, Seller Central, and Shopify (or are quick to learn)

- Are detail-oriented and comfortable handling refunds, returns, and tracking issues

- Can collaborate well with others and clearly hand off tasks or updates



What You’ll Do:

- Respond to customer messages via Gorgias and platform inboxes (Bol, Amazon, Shopify)

- Help customers with product questions, delivery issues, and returns

- Escalate or flag tickets to our Dutch support lead when needed

- Collaborate with our logistics team to resolve delivery problems

- Ensure that every customer feels helped, heard, and happy



What We Offer:



- A flexible, remote-first full-time role (40 hours/week)

- Shift-based structure with a focus on coverage and quality

- Supportive team culture where initiative is valued

- Opportunity to grow with a fast-moving e-commerce brand

- Competitive compensation based on your experience



Ready to Join Us?



If you love helping people, communicate with care, and are ready to jump into a fast-growing startup — we’d love to hear from you.



Apply via this form:





We look forward to reviewing your application and seeing how you can make an impact!



Please add the word “Vacuum” to the last question of the form to show you’ve read the whole post.

title: Digital Marketing Manager – Real Estate & Investor Education
description:
About Us



We are a growing company specializing in real estate investing, creative financing strategies, and investor education. We're building automated marketing systems to generate qualified leads, scale our digital products, and grow our online presence through content-driven campaigns.

About the Role

We're looking for a strategic Digital Marketing Manager to work directly with me (the founder) to build, execute, and optimize our digital marketing systems across
 automation, paid advertising, content marketing, and social media.

This is a fully remote, full-time role for someone who can take ownership of campaigns while collaborating closely with leadership. You'll be executing proven strategies in real estate marketing automation, lead generation, and content distribution—particularly YouTube,
 sequences, and landing page optimization.

Key Responsibilities

 Marketing & Automation (Primary Focus)

• Build and optimize automated
 campaigns using platforms like ReachInbox, ActiveCampaign, or similar CRM/marketing automation tools

• Set up lead nurturing sequences, drip campaigns, and segmentation strategies for cold outreach and warm lead conversion

• Manage API integrations between
 platforms, CRMs, and lead generation tools

Paid Advertising

• Create and manage paid ad campaigns on Google Ads,
/Meta, and YouTube to drive qualified real estate investor leads

• Optimize ad performance through A/B testing, audience targeting, and conversion tracking

• Manage monthly ad budgets and report on ROI and cost-per-lead metrics

Project Coordination

• Work directly with the company in-charge to align marketing efforts with business goals

• Coordinate with freelancers, agencies, or contractors as needed for design, video editing, or technical tasks

• Manage multiple campaigns simultaneously with strong attention to detail and deadlines

Requirements

Must Have:

• 2+ years of proven experience in digital marketing (please provide portfolio, case studies, or specific campaign results)

• Strong expertise in
 marketing automation – experience with tools like ActiveCampaign, Mailchimp, ConvertKit, or similar platforms

• Hands-on experience managing paid ad campaigns (Google Ads,
/Meta)

• Solid understanding of lead generation funnels, CRM systems, and marketing analytics

• Experience with API integrations or willingness to learn technical marketing tools

• Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

• Strong organizational and time-management skills with ability to manage multiple projects

• Self-motivated and comfortable working independently in a remote environment

Nice to Have:

• Experience in real estate marketing or investor education industries

• Familiarity with YouTube content strategy and algorithm optimization

• Experience with landing page builders (ClickFunnels, Unbounce, Leadpages, etc.)

• Knowledge of cold
 outreach best practices and deliverability optimization

• Experience working directly with a founder or in a startup/small business environment

• Background in B2B lead generation or info product marketing

Work Arrangement

• Salary: TBD

• Hours: Full-time (40 hours/week)

• Work Setup: Fully remote

• Time Zone: Flexible, but must have overlap with PST hours for collaboration

How to Apply

Please submit your application to 

In your application, include:

1. The word "AUTOMATION" in the subject line (this shows you read the full job post)

2. Your resume/CV

3. Portfolio or case studies showing specific campaigns you've managed and the results you achieved (e.g., "Increased
 open rates by 35%" or "Generated 200 qualified leads at $12 cost-per-lead")

4. Brief answers to these questions:

• Describe a successful
 automation campaign you built. What tools did you use and what were the results?

• What's your experience with real estate or investor education marketing? (If none, that's okay—just let us know)

• What marketing automation tools are you most proficient with?

Why Join Us?

• Work directly with the founder in a collaborative, learning-focused environment

• Opportunity to build marketing systems from the ground up and see direct impact

• Exposure to real estate investing, digital product creation, and content marketing strategies

• Long-term growth potential as the business scales
